Example_1.review: Got a letter in the mail last week that said Dr. Goldberg is moving to Arizona to take a new position there in June. He will be missed very much. \n\nI think finding a new doctor in NYC that you actually like might almost be as awful as trying to find a date!
Example_1.explanation: The speaker expresses a positive sentiment towards Dr. Goldberg, indicating they valued him as a doctor. However, the sentiment towards finding a new doctor is negative, comparing it to the difficulty of finding a date in NYC.
key_phrases: He will be missed very much
finding a new doctor in NYC that you actually like might almost be as awful as trying to find a date
Dr. Goldberg is moving to Arizona

Example_2.review: Top notch doctor in a top notch practice. Can't say I am surprised when I was referred to him by another doctor who I think is wonderful and because he went to one of the best medical schools in the country. \nIt is really easy to get an appointment. There is minimal wait to be seen and his bedside manner is great.
Example_2.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the doctor's qualifications, the ease of scheduling an appointment, the short waiting time, and the doctor's bedside manner. The referral from another trusted doctor adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: Top notch doctor in a top notch practice
really easy to get an appointment
minimal wait to be seen and his bedside manner is great

Example_3.review: Dr. Eric Goldberg is a fantastic doctor who has correctly diagnosed every issue that my wife and I have had. Unlike many of my past doctors, Dr. Goldberg is very accessible and we have been able to schedule appointments with him and his staff very quickly. We are happy to have him in the neighborhood and look forward to being his patients for many years to come.
Example_3.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with Dr. Goldberg's medical expertise and accessibility, indicating a very positive experience without any negative comments.

Example_5.review: I drove by yesterday to get a sneak peak. It re-opens on July 14th and I can't wait to take my kids. The new range looks amazing. The entire range appears to be turf, which may or many not help your game, but it looks really nice. The tee boxes look state of the art and the club house looks like something you'll see on a newer course. Can't wait to experience it!
Example_5.explanation: The reviewer expresses excitement and anticipation for the re-opening of the place, highlighting several positive aspects they are looking forward to experiencing.
key_phrases: can't wait to take my kids
The entire range appears to be turf

Example_6.review: After waiting for almost 30 minutes to trade in an old phone part of the buy back program, our customer service rep incorrectly processed the transaction. This led to us waiting another 30 minutes for him to correct it. Don't visit this store if you want pleasant or good service.
Example_6.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience with both the wait time and the service provided. The transaction was not only processed incorrectly, but it also took an additional long wait to correct it, and the reviewer advises against visiting the store for good service.

Example_7.review: Old school.....traditional \"mom 'n pop\" quality and perfection. The best fish and chips you'll ever enjoy and equally superb fried shrimp. A great out of the way, non-corporate, vestige of Americana. You will love it.
Example_7.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'the best' and 'equally superb' to describe the food, indicating a very positive experience. The phrase 'You will love it' directly addresses potential customers with a strong endorsement. The appreciation for 'traditional "mom 'n pop" quality' suggests a high value placed on the authenticity and care in the food preparation.
key_phrases: The best fish and chips you'll ever enjoy

Example_8.review: Good beer selection. Understaffed for a light Monday night crowd, it wasn't her fault she was the only server. But it took about an hour to get our sandwiches. Mine was one of the best reubens I've ever had.
Example_8.explanation: The positive sentiment of having one of the best reubens and a good beer selection is somewhat offset by the negative experience of slow service due to understaffing. However, the customer seems understanding of the situation and places no fault on the server.
key_phrases: one of the best reubens I've ever had
took about an hour to get our sandwiches

Example_9.review: Very disappointed in the customer service. We ordered Reuben's and wanted coleslaw instead of kraut. They charged us $3.00 for the coleslaw. We will not be back . The iced tea is also terrible tasting.
Example_9.explanation: The customer expresses a strong negative sentiment towards the customer service and is upset about being charged extra for a substitution. The statement 'We will not be back' indicates a decision against returning due to the negative experience. Additionally, the customer finds the iced tea terrible, which adds to the negative review.
key_phrases: Very disappointed in the customer service

Example_10.review: Used to go there for tires, brakes, etc. Their prices have gone way up-$400 for 4 mid-level tires for a Toyota. Plus, 1 of the new tires went flat within 3 weeks. Since they don\"t make appointments, the wait to get the tire looked at was ~2 hours. Sorry--can't wait that long to get a warranted repair, They lost my business for good.
Example_10.explanation: The reviewer is expressing significant dissatisfaction with both the quality of the product and the service. A new tire going flat so quickly suggests poor quality, and the high prices combined with long wait times for service exacerbate the negative experience.
key_phrases: 1 of the new tires went flat within 3 weeks
Their prices have gone way up
the wait to get the tire looked at was ~2 hours

Example_11.review: Terrible. Preordered my tires and when I arrived they couldn't find the order anywhere. Once we got through that process I waited over 2 hours for them to be put on... I was originally told it would take 30 mins. Slow, over priced, I'll go elsewhere next time.
Example_11.explanation: The use of 'Terrible' indicates a strong negative sentiment. The customer had a significant wait time, which was much longer than expected, and there were issues with the order process. Additionally, the customer found the service to be slow and overpriced.

Example_12.review: Last summer I had an appointment to get new tires and had to wait a super long time. I also went in this week for them to fix a minor problem with a tire they put on. They \"fixed\" it for free, and the very next morning I had the same issue. I called to complain, and the \"manager\" didn't even apologize!!! So frustrated. Never going back. They seem overpriced, too.
Example_12.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment by stating they will never return to the business. The long wait time, recurring issue with the service, lack of apology from the manager, and perception of being overpriced contribute to the negative experience.
key_phrases: had to wait a super long time
the very next morning I had the same issue

Example_13.review: Average run of the mill store. Associates are young teens and they really don't know where anything is. Luckily I am able to get around to find everything. Found my puppy treats and moved on.
Example_13.explanation: The reviewer expresses a neutral sentiment about the store being average and has a negative view of the associates' knowledge. However, they also indicate self-sufficiency in finding what they need and successfully completing their shopping.
key_phrases: Associates are young teens and they really don't know where anything is
Average run of the mill store
Luckily I am able to get around to find everything

Example_14.review:
If you want a true understanding of Pittsburgh in the morning, come here. This greasy spoon is always packed, and is one of the better of its kind south of the city.

They serve waffles in halves, which is great. The eggs and toast are good, the homemade hot sausage is excellent. The drawback are the barely cooked potatoes.

If you're hungry, get "The Mixed Grill"... Gab and Eat's brand of the "kitchen sink" breakfast that all Midwest places are about.
Example_14.explanation: The reviewer provides a positive depiction of the restaurant's atmosphere and quality, particularly praising the sausage and the authenticity of the experience. The mention of 'barely cooked potatoes' is a minor complaint in the context of the overall positive review.
key_phrases: one of the better of its kind
The eggs and toast are good

Example_16.review: Great breakfast, good price. You might have to stand outside in line though, so I don't really recommend winter time to go. lol. Very friendly service, interesting coffee mugs. They have great deserts and such also. Bring your cash though as they dont' take cards.
Example_16.explanation: The review starts with positive comments about the breakfast and price, and mentions friendly service, which are all indicative of a positive experience. However, there are some inconveniences mentioned such as the potential for standing in line outside during winter and the cash-only policy.

Example_17.review: What a find! I stopped in here for breakfast while in town for business. The service is so friendly I thought I was down south. The service was quick, frankly and felt like I was with family. \nFantastic poached eggs, Cajun homefries and crispy bacon. Gab and Eat is definitely a place I world recommend to locals. I was stuffed and the bill was only $8.00.
Example_17.explanation: The review is overwhelmingly positive, with praise for the food, service, atmosphere, and price.
key_phrases: Fantastic poached eggs, Cajun homefries and crispy bacon
The service is so friendly I thought I was down south

Example_19.review: I needed alterations done to my suit very quickly. Like three days quickly. Not only did Filberto at Alteration World have it ready, the price was beyond reasonable and the work was EXCELLENT! I plan on bringing all my clothes to him from now on.\n\nOh and he let me know that they also dry-clean. Wonderful shop!
Example_19.explanation: The reviewer is highly satisfied with the quick service, excellent work, and reasonable pricing. They also express a strong future commitment to the service.

Example_20.review: Are you are really looking at the review for LJS? Its fried stuff, with extra fried stuff in a cardboard boat. You will regret eating it 30 minutes after you finish, but it is delicious.
Example_20.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges that the food is delicious despite being unhealthy and potentially causing regret after consumption. The emphasis on the food being 'fried stuff' suggests a negative connotation, but this is mitigated by the admission of the food's deliciousness.
key_phrases: You will regret eating it 30 minutes after you finish
fried stuff, with extra fried stuff

Example_21.review: Don Don is a restaurant I find myself missing now and again, it's probably my favorite restaurant in Carnegie. Simple setup, just a small restaurant with a few tables and a TV. Oddly enough I think my favorite thing to eat there is the wonton soup, never had better. The food is average but I always enjoyed eating there, great service and a cheap place to get Chinese food.
Example_21.explanation: The reviewer expresses a fondness for the restaurant, indicating it is their favorite in the area and has the best wonton soup they've ever had. Despite describing the food as average, the positive sentiment is reinforced by the mention of great service and the value for money.

Example_22.review: Take it from me; avoid this place at all cost. The only time I go is when I am starved and don't have the energy to cook or get edible food. And then after I have been kicking myself.
Example_22.explanation: The reviewer strongly advises against going to the restaurant, indicating that they only go there when they have no other choice due to extreme hunger and lack of energy. The regret expressed ('kicking myself') after visiting suggests a very negative experience.
key_phrases: avoid this place at all cost
The only time I go is when I am starved

Example_23.review: We went on a weeknight. Place was not busy waited over 20 minutes for drinks and to have our order taken. We ordered an app and it came out with the meals and that was another 20 minutes or so. Food was luke warm at best. I would not go back.
Example_23.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience with service speed and food temperature, and they explicitly stated they would not return, indicating a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: Food was luke warm at best

Example_24.review: This location never disappoints!! Food is always consistently great, and if you come at the right time, (witching hours) you may see the cook singing and dancing along with the music in the back. And it is awesome! ! Love this place!!
Example_24.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong satisfaction with the consistency of the food quality and the enjoyable atmosphere, particularly highlighting the cook's singing and dancing as a positive experience.
key_phrases: cook singing and dancing along with the music

Example_25.review: I belong to this gym... I live in the South section of Pittsburgh, and I find that this gym is not too far from me. The staff is friendly, the equipment is quite good. You get two free personal training sessions when you join. They have lots of weights (which my boyfriend uses) and a decent cardio room. The only thing I would say is to increase some of the cardio equipment. Water is only $1 a bottle!
Example_25.explanation: The review is mostly positive, highlighting the friendliness of the staff, the quality of the equipment, and the value-added personal training sessions. The reviewer also appreciates the variety of weights and the cardio room, though they do suggest an improvement by increasing the cardio equipment. The mention of affordable water adds to the positive sentiment. The only mild criticism does not overshadow the overall positive experience.

Example_26.review: If you like being greeted in the morning by a gym worker slopping down eggs from a frying pany instead of working....this is your gym....complain to the manager and she gets nasty....try getting in touch with the owner....impossible! Most unprofessional gym ever!!!!
Example_26.explanation: The review contains multiple strong negative statements about professionalism and customer service. The reviewer is clearly dissatisfied with the staff behavior, management response, and overall experience.
key_phrases: complain to the manager and she gets nasty
try getting in touch with the owner....impossible

Example_27.review: Terrible service. Food unremarkable. Waiter disappeared for 45 minutes to serve larger group due to staffing mismanagement. Saved his tip by discounting meal after I complained. All and all, a very crude and unpleasant dining experience for me and my guests. Not to be repeated, never again!
Example_27.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with both the service and the food quality. The mention of the waiter disappearing and the overall experience being described as crude and unpleasant indicate a very negative experience.

Example_28.review:
Yay, I'm a fan of the white pizza. Had take out. 

The bar was jumping when I picked up our order.

The white pizza is so delicious...with garlic, spinach, feta, and added some veggies. Tried the Roman Style calamari, very good better than the fried calamari we had last time.
Example_28.explanation: The reviewer expresses enthusiasm and positive feelings towards the white pizza and the Roman Style calamari, indicating a better experience than a previous visit. The use of 'Yay' and 'so delicious' shows a high level of satisfaction.
key_phrases: very good better than the fried calamari

Example_29.review: Great little gem! The food was fantastic was very food and just the right price. The Italian food was amazing, but you can not leave without a dessert and be prepared for giant serving. I had the carrot cake yummy!! Def a place everyone should try.
Example_29.explanation: The reviewer uses multiple enthusiastic phrases to describe their positive experience. They highlight the quality of the food, the value for the price, and recommend that others visit the restaurant.

Example_30.review: san francisco california visitor liked the food and the local is great. I am thinking about relocating to pttsbrgh area. I liked Carnegie because u can stroll down Main street and hit a couple places for lunch. I imagine this place would be crazy busy on friday or saturday night. we ate a lunchtime and it was nice.
Example_30.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the food and location, and also shares a positive personal consideration about relocating to the area, which suggests a good overall impression of the locale.

Example_31.review: Service in this place is poor because of lack of acknowledgment since people working there are \"just\" working . They have nice decor,nice bar and good bread. Consider where this place is ,the prices are really really high . Nothing is served on the side with main dishes ....
Example_31.explanation: The reviewer is clearly dissatisfied with the service, indicating it is poor and lacks acknowledgment, which suggests a negative experience. The high prices and lack of side dishes with main courses add to the negative sentiment. Positive notes about decor, bar, and bread are not enough to offset the negative aspects.
key_phrases: Service in this place is poor
Nothing is served on the side with main dishes

Example_32.review:
I was pleasantly surprised by this restaurant. Came here with no expectations. 

I was greeted by a large open (garage style) window, that opened the whole lounge bar area to the street. It had modern furnishings and the staff were quite friendly.

Ordered the quattro formaggi pizza. Quite good!!! Great balance of cheeses. Not too rich at all. Crust was excellent too. Can't wait to come back.
Example_32.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, with no prior expectations, and was pleasantly surprised. They enjoyed the pizza, noting the balance of cheeses and the quality of the crust, and expressed a desire to return.
key_phrases: Quite good!!! Great balance of cheeses

Example_33.review: Service was great. Apps delish, specifically the stuffed banana peppers & lentil with ham soup. I think I chose the wrong entree though because I ordered a cod with crabmeat special. The cod was completely tasteless with some crabmeat layed across the top. It all reminded me of boiled fish. Yuck! Note to self. Order the pasta!
Example_33.explanation: The review starts positively with compliments about the service and appetizers, but the main course, which is a significant part of the meal, was a letdown for the customer. The negative reaction to the entree ('Yuck!') suggests a strong disappointment.

Example_34.review:
spinach/feta cheese salad: B-
pesto alfredo penne : :A+
Coconut Cake huge piece: A+
bread small portions: B
Service B 
host seemed grumpy, waitress good, but then she got busy .
PRICE: Pasta was $15 and the portion smallish more like a $12.99 dish 
ARRIVE EARLY ON SATURDAY NIGHT THIS PLACE PACKED after 6pm
Example_34.explanation: The review contains a mix of positive and negative feedback. High marks for specific dishes indicate satisfaction, while the comments on service and price suggest some areas of disappointment. However, the positive comments on food seem to outweigh the negatives.
key_phrases: host seemed grumpy, waitress good, but then she got busy

Example_35.review: It was just what we were looking for. The service was great. My husband had the veal sausage on green pepper appetizer in the larger size. It was great (spicy) and enough for a meal. I had the stuffed eggplant. That was very good but the sauce could have been a bit heartier. I would definitely go back. Really nice atmosphere and free parking in the back.
Example_35.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the service and the atmosphere of the restaurant. They also found the food to be great and to their liking, with only a minor critique about the sauce not being hearty enough. The intention to return to the restaurant indicates a positive sentiment.
key_phrases: It was just what we were looking for

Example_37.review: Talk about overpriced. $18 for a fairly basic pasta with some obviously frozen chicken chopped up over it. The latter was terrible, thin and flabby and rather unappealing. The pasta itself was ok, as was the sauce. The desserts are pretty good. But honestly, that is a $10 dish whose price has been inflated.
Example_37.explanation: The reviewer is clearly dissatisfied with the value for money, describing the dish as overpriced and criticizing the quality of the chicken. The pasta and sauce being 'ok' and the desserts being 'pretty good' prevent the score from being the lowest.
key_phrases: terrible, thin and flabby and rather unappealing

Example_38.review: I've decided where I stand with Emmert Dental. They are unprofessional, rude and have no clue what they're doing (behind the desk). I will not be going back nor will I have nice things to say about them.
Example_38.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative opinion about the professionalism and behavior of the staff, indicating a clear dissatisfaction with the service. The decision not to return and to speak negatively about the experience reinforces the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: unprofessional, rude and have no clue what they're doing
I will not be going back
nor will I have nice things to say about them

Example_39.review:
This McDonald's is so bad it's amazing. 

Order: Big mac, large fries, diet coke.

The soda machine was broken.  No sodas.

Then I got to the window. "We rang you up for medium fries."  (Not what I asked for) "Well, if you want a large, you're gonna have to wait 4 minutes. We just started a new batch."

Left with: Big mac, medium fries, no coke.

Actually, now that I think about it, this was one of my better experiences there...
Example_39.explanation: The review is filled with sarcasm, indicating a negative experience. The customer did not receive what they ordered, and the equipment was not functioning. However, the last line suggests that this is not unusual for this location, which might indicate that the experience was not as bad as it could have been.
key_phrases: This McDonald's is so bad it's amazing
We rang you up for medium fries

Example_40.review: Mmm...peppermint mocha\n\nIn my quest to visit every Starbucks in the USA I have stopped at yet another location. This one is located in the center of a circle road -- very cache and in a newer part of the area.
Example_40.explanation: The speaker seems pleased with their peppermint mocha, indicating a positive experience. The mention of a quest to visit every Starbucks suggests a generally positive predisposition towards the brand. The description of the location as 'very cache' and in a 'newer part of the area' implies a trendy and possibly upscale setting, which is typically seen as positive.
key_phrases: visit every Starbucks in the USA
very cache and in a newer part of the area

Example_41.review: If there was ever a \"get your coffee and go\" Starbucks, this is it. Right in the center of the Waterfront, this Starbucks has no sofa, comfy chairs, only table seating. I love the baristas here, But I don't like the location of the building.
Example_41.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the staff but is disappointed by the lack of comfortable seating and the location of the Starbucks. The sentiment is mixed, with positive feedback about the baristas but negative feedback about the seating and location.
key_phrases: no sofa, comfy chairs, only table seating
I don't like the location of the building

Example_42.review: This Starbucks is 5-Star Friendly. The shift supervisor Lucious keeps the energy in there moving and light. He recently helped me with a merchandise return and embodied everything a good manager and all around mensch person should - patience, kindness, generosity and fairness. I left that afternoon loving Starbucks even more than when I went in. It's great that a company and their employees can be as loyal to their customers as their customers are to them.
Example_42.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the service, particularly praising the shift supervisor for excellent management and customer service qualities. The positive experience enhanced the reviewer's loyalty and affection for the brand.
key_phrases: embodied everything a good manager and all around mensch person should

Example_43.explanation: The reviewer provides a mixed review, noting both pros and cons. The service rating of 4 indicates dissatisfaction, and comments about greasiness and wait times are negative. However, the positive note about milkshakes and the acknowledgment of freshness suggest some redeeming qualities.
key_phrases: Takes longer than typical in drive thru

Example_44.review: Ah, Steak n Shake, you hit the spot after a night of drinking. Open 24 hours, drive thru or dine in, with wonderful, cheap greasy burgers, chicken fingers, breakfast sandwiches, and shoestring fries. You're faster (and cheaper!) than Eat N Park. Plus your employees wear those adorable bow ties. Granted, if we were at a fancy party, I might act like I don't know you, but deep down inside you know I heart you.
Example_44.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment by saying the restaurant 'hit the spot' and compliments the food and the service. The mention of a 'fancy party' suggests a playful recognition that the restaurant isn't high-end, but this does not detract from the overall positive experience.

Example_45.review: This place is s l o w....like so slow I have got up and left after waiting 30 minutes and not even being acknowledged by a server. The food is okay. Def not worth the wait. Milkshakes are just okay as well. Booooooo.
Example_45.explanation: The reviewer expresses significant dissatisfaction with the service speed, to the point of leaving before being served. The food and milkshakes are described as just okay, which does not compensate for the poor service.
key_phrases: so slow I have got up and left
not even being acknowledged by a server

Example_46.review: I really like the chili. Burgers are fair and salads are pretty bad. Pretty hard to mess up a side salad. As others have said you never know what kind of service you will get. Store is usually understaffed and cleanliness is fair. The staff is usually disinterested with customers and sometimes outright rude. All in all what you pay is what you get. Cheap and crap service.
Example_46.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear dissatisfaction with the service, describing it as 'cheap and crap' and noting the staff's disinterest and rudeness. The negative sentiment is reinforced by the comment on the salads being 'pretty bad' and the uncertainty of service quality. While they do 'really like the chili,' the overall tone of the review is negative due to the multiple issues raised.
key_phrases: staff is usually disinterested with customers and sometimes outright rude

Example_47.review: The food is good. Unfortunately the service is very hit or miss. The main issue seems to be with the kitchen, the waiters and waitresses are often very apologetic for the long waits and it's pretty obvious that some of them avoid the tables after taking the initial order to avoid hearing complaints.
Example_47.explanation: The positive aspect of good food is overshadowed by the negative experiences with service and long waits. The mention of staff avoiding tables indicates a significant issue with service.
key_phrases: service is very hit or miss

Example_48.review: Food is good, what you'd expect from Steak n Shake. THE SERVICE IS AWFUL. so incredibly awful. expect to take at least an hour for your meal, even when it's slow. I've been going here for years when I want a cheap meal, but the service is so so so awful. Go to McDonalds.
Example_48.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges that the food meets their expectations for Steak n Shake, which is positive. However, the extremely negative sentiment towards the service, emphasized by repetition and capitalization, heavily outweighs the positive comment about the food.
key_phrases: expect to take at least an hour for your meal

Example_49.review: Burgers are not the best quality. Better than McDonald's but not much better. The fries are fairly thin, but crispy. They aren't bad. The prices are also quite decent. However, their shakes are amazing. Thick and creamy. It's also great that they have half off shakes on weekdays in the early morning like 1-3am.
Example_49.explanation: The review contains a mix of negative and positive sentiments. The negative sentiment is about the burger quality, which is a significant part of the meal. However, the positive comments about the shakes and the prices, especially the half-off shakes deal, seem to outweigh the negatives.
key_phrases: Better than McDonald's but not much better

Example_50.review: I love Steak N Shake. This one, however, leaves a lot to be desired. The food often comes out cold and the servers are apathetic at best. Most of the time, they're downright rude. I highly recommend avoiding this location if possible. There's one on Route 51 that's worth the 15 minutes it'll take you to get there.
Example_50.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear dissatisfaction with the service and the temperature of the food, which are significant aspects of a dining experience. They also recommend avoiding this location, which indicates a strong negative sentiment.

Example_51.review: Every time we come here the service is laughably bad. On this visit a tabe which was sat after us had their food before our server graced us with her surly presence. Good restaurant elsewhere, just avoid this location if you want to get your food inside an hour.
Example_51.explanation: The reviewer is expressing significant dissatisfaction with the service, which is a critical aspect of the dining experience. The mention of 'laughably bad' service and a 'surly' server indicates a very negative experience. However, they do note that other locations of the restaurant are good, which suggests that the food might be acceptable.
key_phrases: had their food before our server graced us with her surly presence
avoid this location if you want to get your food inside an hour

Example_53.review: It's okay. Food is cheap but portions are small. For example I order the chicken tenders, and I got 3 little tiny tenders, and a decent amount of fries. Also the restaurant is not really clean either. This restaurant is not my number 1 choice.
Example_53.explanation: The reviewer finds the cleanliness of the restaurant lacking and is dissatisfied with the portion sizes, specifically mentioning a disappointing experience with the chicken tenders. However, they also note that the food is cheap, which is somewhat positive.

Example_54.review: Love this store! Don't always have much luck with the sales, but I always find something I like here. This isn't your average Marshall's or TJ Max. I think the green dress I'm wearing is from Filene's!
Example_54.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by stating they love the store and consistently find items they like. The comparison to other stores suggests a higher regard for this store. The mention of not always having luck with sales is a minor negative point but doesn't detract significantly from the overall positive sentiment.
key_phrases: always find something I like here
isn't your average Marshall's or TJ Max

Example_55.review: $9.75 for a red bull and vodka? I'm sorry, I thought I was in Pittsburgh, not New York City. Sing Sing, a dueling piano bar, is fun, but it would be a hell of a lot more fun if I could have more than one watered down drink before I warbled my way through \"Paradise City\" with the rest of the crowd.
Example_55.explanation: The reviewer is clearly upset about the price of the drinks and their quality, indicating a negative experience. However, they did find the piano bar itself to be fun, which adds a slightly positive aspect to the review.
key_phrases: $9.75 for a red bull and vodka
I thought I was in Pittsburgh, not New York City

Example_56.review: Sing Sing is awesome!! Give a buck or more and they will play anything, and if they don't know it, they will search for who requested the song so they can do something else the person will enjoy! :) Great humor too!! :)
Example_56.explanation: The reviewer expresses high enthusiasm and satisfaction with the service and entertainment provided by the restaurant. The use of multiple exclamation marks and a smiley face indicates a very positive experience.

Example_57.review: He was incredibly sexist/homophobic. He could barely play the piano and when we finally recognized a song we could actually dance to he literally asked me to get off stage because he didn't like another on stage who could actually dance with the girls.
Example_57.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong negative sentiments about the behavior and performance of the individual, which greatly impacted their experience.
key_phrases: asked me to get off stage

Example_58.review: Pretty fun place to go every once in a while, but, believe me, by the end of the night you'll be ready to go. The show lasts around 5 hours, by the 3 hour mark you'll be sick of sitting there in the crowd with your $9 a pop drinks listening to the same dirty jokes over and over and over again.
Example_58.explanation: The review starts with a positive note, indicating it can be a fun place occasionally. However, the sentiment quickly turns negative with the reviewer expressing a strong desire to leave due to the repetitive nature of the entertainment and the high cost of drinks.
key_phrases: sick of sitting there in the crowd
same dirty jokes over and over and over again
by the end of the night you'll be ready to go

Example_59.review: Would like to give NO STARS. bought all new kitchen appliances there. Refrigerator is defective. They\nsend an outside company to repair. Man arrives with NO TOOLS and wrong size seal for freezer. not once, twice. The first time, he tries to use my spoon from counter to install it! I complain, too bad...they have to comeTHREE times before replacing it! NEVER AGAIN.
Example_59.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment by stating they would give no stars if possible, indicating a very poor experience. The defective refrigerator and the inadequate service response amplify the negative sentiment. The phrase 'NEVER AGAIN' suggests a complete loss of trust and dissatisfaction with the service.
key_phrases: Would like to give NO STARS

Example_60.review: Your typical area big box hardware store. It's convenient to go to because of the proximity to other stores and how close it is to so many communities.\n\nCan't really say much else about this place other than with the self checkout lanes it's a breeze to run in and then out without having to deal with a single associate.
Example_60.explanation: The reviewer finds the convenience and self-checkout options positive, but their tone suggests a lack of exceptional qualities about the store.
key_phrases: a breeze to run in and then out

Example_61.review: This local Lowe's serves its purpose for my husband and me -- a convenient home improvement store that we run into every month or two. I am most impressed by the lawn and garden section of the store. I am not sure how it compares to other Lowe's stores, but when shopping at the Home Depot in North Fayette last fall, their flower selection was dismal compared to this Lowe's.
Example_61.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with the store's lawn and garden section and finds it convenient for their needs. They also make a positive comparison to another store's flower selection.
key_phrases: most impressed by the lawn and garden section

Example_62.review: The food here can actually be a little hit and miss, but I love the grilled cheese club with fries. I get it way too much. People make fun of me.\n\nThey have a ten dollar minimum for credit cards, fyi.
Example_62.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges inconsistency in the quality of the food but expresses a strong liking for a specific item, the grilled cheese club with fries. The mention of a credit card minimum is neutral and more informational than sentiment-driven.
key_phrases: food here can actually be a little hit and miss
but I love the grilled cheese club with fries
They have a ten dollar minimum for credit cards, fyi

Example_63.review: This place is overrated. A friend and I were looking forward to a beer and some good bar food- instead the wings were terrible and the beer was good but overpriced. There's nothing wrong with this place I just don't understand the clout around it. There should be no clout.
Example_63.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations due to the restaurant's reputation but was disappointed with the food quality and prices. The positive aspect is that the beer was good, but this is overshadowed by the negative aspects.

Example_64.review:
I love the games here but can't go very often since they don't rotate new games in very often. The place is usually pretty clean.

Pool tables often have a wait on the weekend but are some of the better ones you'll find in the city.

Food is just "ok" Drink prices are fair but not great.
Example_64.explanation: The reviewer expresses a mix of positive and negative sentiments. They love the games and note the cleanliness, which are positive. However, they are disappointed by the lack of new games, the wait for pool tables, and the quality of food and drink prices, which are negative.
key_phrases: don't rotate new games in very often
Pool tables often have a wait on the weekend

Example_65.review: Dave and busters is the best place to eat and play games. There is many fun games and prizes to win. I highly suggest if you want to plays games, go Wednesday when all the games are half off. Food is pretty good and a nice bar. The downside is that the booze is pretty pricey.
Example_65.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment about the place overall, highlighting it as the best for eating and playing games, with fun games and good food. The mention of a downside regarding the price of alcohol does not seem to significantly detract from the overall positive experience.
key_phrases: the best place to eat and play games
many fun games and prizes to win
Food is pretty good and a nice bar

Example_66.review:
This place just plain sucks
Bad management lost them biz
Dumb arcade drama*

* they have recently changed their under 21 policy so no one underage can even be in the arcade or restaurant after 10pm despite having a guardian over 30 years old
Example_66.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language ('sucks', 'bad management', 'dumb') to express dissatisfaction with the restaurant. The change in policy is also mentioned as a negative aspect.

Example_67.review: A fun place and lots to do but a bit pricy. $20.00 will buy you a hundred points which will last you a little over an hour.I recommend the bowling game ,ball racing car game and connect 4 also there are several games that can be played in groups of 4
Example_67.explanation: The reviewer seems to enjoy the variety of activities and recommends specific games, indicating a positive experience. However, they also note the price as a negative factor.

Example_68.review: Most of the games were out of order and I had to find one of those referee looking people to fix 2 of them that took some of our credits. Apathetic service staff all around, the Peanut and I were really disappointed. Won't be back.
Example_68.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience with the games not working and poor service, which led to disappointment and a decision not to return.
key_phrases: Most of the games were out of order
had to find one of those referee looking people to fix 2 of them

Example_69.review: My friends got everyhing from steak(they didn't even get a well done steak right) to mahi tacos and the only great menu item was the seasoned vegetables- give it a miss. Sing sing next door is awesome but get dinner somewere else. After we were done the waiter asked if we were ready for the checks and I had ordered meal that came with a desert! Really dissapointing all around.
Example_69.explanation: The reviewer expresses disappointment with multiple aspects of their dining experience, including the preparation of the steak, the overall meal, and the service forgetting about the included dessert. The recommendation to dine elsewhere reinforces the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: they didn't even get a well done steak right
the only great menu item was the seasoned vegetables

Example_70.review: Little slow on the service and didn't have the beer I wanted on the menu. But you get those things when they brew their own beers on-site.  But the stadium pretzels are good. The cream stout is tasty.\n\nThe burgers are good and big with the little skinny fries. I'm not a fan of the skinny fry, but hey the burgers would choke a horse - and almost did. :o)
Example_70.explanation: The review contains a mix of mild complaints and compliments. The service was slow, and they didn't have the desired beer, which are negatives. However, the positive comments about the food and beer they do brew on-site suggest an overall satisfactory experience.
key_phrases: burgers would choke a horse - and almost did
didn't have the beer I wanted

Example_71.review: Went with a group after work for dinner and a brew. We ordered a few appetizers first. The wings are good and the soft pretzels with spicy spinach cheese dip was fun. Had a burger, you can create your own from veggie, turkey, or fresh ground beef. Had a fresh ground beef and the meat was fresh and cooked perfectly with a fresh bun.\n\nThe brew pub is nice and was surprised it wasn't busier.
Example_71.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the food, highlighting the quality of the meat and the enjoyment of the appetizers. The surprise about the place not being busier suggests they believe it deserves more customers based on their experience.
key_phrases: meat was fresh and cooked perfectly
soft pretzels with spicy spinach cheese dip was fun

Example_72.review: Beer selection was good, but they were out of the ones we wanted. 4 of the 6 people in our group ordered steaks all of them were cooked to their satisfaction. The bourbanzola was a good addition. Defiantly a place I would go again. Joe, our server, was awesome and super friendly.
Example_72.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience overall, highlighted by their willingness to return, satisfaction with the steaks, and a good server. The beer selection issue seems minor in comparison to the rest of the positive feedback.
key_phrases: Defiantly a place I would go again
Joe, our server, was awesome and super friendly
all of them were cooked to their satisfaction

Example_73.review: I must admit, I do like the brews. I also like the white cheddar mash potatoes. Other than that, meh. The food is pretty forgettable. Another \"brewery\" that sadly fails to be anything special in the food department. With the restaurants upping the ante on 8th Ave, you may want to kick it up a notch Rock Bottom. But how would anyone know to? It's a chain. Whomp whomp!
Example_73.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear disappointment in the food's memorability and distinctiveness, which are significant aspects of a dining experience. However, they did find some positive aspects, such as the brews and the white cheddar mash potatoes.
key_phrases: sadly fails to be anything special in the food department

Example_74.review: For a brewery who is attempting to take advantage of Oktoberfest you wonder how at 7 pm they could be out of mashed potatoes & sauerkraut then a sausage platter with sweet mustard guess they have not been to Germany. Not worth $5.95 unfortunately the sausage platter was $15.95.
Example_74.explanation: The reviewer is disappointed with the lack of authenticity and availability of traditional Oktoberfest items, and they feel that the price does not reflect the value of the food they received.
key_phrases: attempting to take advantage of Oktoberfest

Example_75.review: The only reason Rock Bottom gets 3 stars is because of the brews. Food was \"eh\", not many vegetarian options and hostesses who will ignore you because they are too busy chatting about who didn't text them back. This place has the potential to be great, but sadly, it falls way too short in almost all areas.
Example_75.explanation: The reviewer gives credit for the brews, which prevents the lowest score, but expresses dissatisfaction with the food quality, lack of vegetarian options, and poor service from the hostesses. The overall experience is deemed lacking.
key_phrases: falls way too short in almost all areas

Example_77.review: Its not bad. I'm not into chain kind of places, but if you're with a group that doesn't do anything more adventurous, you'll do fine here. I vacillated between 2 and 3 stars but the house beer I had will make sure I come back from time to time.
Example_77.explanation: The reviewer seems to have a neutral to slightly positive experience. They are not fond of chain restaurants but found the experience acceptable enough to consider returning, primarily due to the house beer.
key_phrases: the house beer I had will make sure I come back from time to time

Example_78.review: I rarely give a business a superior rating, but I have to say my wife and I had one of the best dining experiences at the Rock Bottom Brewery.  The food was delicious, the beer, every recipe sampled, was amazing and the service was wonderful. The staff made us feel like we were the most important guests in the restaurant. \n\nPlease support this business. I guarantee you will not be disappointed.
Example_78.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'best dining experiences' and 'delicious' to describe the food and experience. They also praise the beer variety and quality, and the service, indicating a very positive experience.
key_phrases: one of the best dining experiences
beer, every recipe sampled, was amazing

Example_79.review: Another good meal ... this time the Housemade Meatloaf. It's a blend of turkey and sausage instead of the standard ground beef. A refreshing and delicious twist on a comfort food staple. Served over cheddar mashed and mixed veggies. The server could have behaved like she wanted to be there but everyone has a bad day once in awhile. Service was prompt just the same. Overall good experience.
Example_79.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the food, highlighting the meal as 'good' and describing the twist on the meatloaf as 'refreshing and delicious'. Although there was a minor complaint about the server's demeanor, the overall experience was still considered good, and the service was prompt.

Example_80.review: Poor service and food. I waited 20 minutes at the bar for someone to just acknowledge my presence. They finally brought my food out and left it without asking for me to pay.... So I had to wait an additional 15 minutes to find someone to pay. Yes, I had to TRY and give them money.\n\nOn to the important part... Food was terrible. I had a burger and it was pathetic.
Example_80.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with both the service and the quality of the food, using words like 'poor', 'terrible', and 'pathetic' to describe their experience.

Example_81.review: Planned a surprise birthday party here for my wife and they did an amazing job helping to pull it off! Service was extremely helpful, professional, and on point all night. Lauren (one of the managers) was reliable and pleasant throughout the entire planning process. If anyone is looking to plan an event I would highly recommend Rock Bottom. Couldn't be happier!
Example_81.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the service and the management, particularly praising the staff's help in organizing a surprise party. The use of 'amazing job,' 'extremely helpful,' and 'highly recommend' indicates a very positive experience.
key_phrases: extremely helpful, professional, and on point

Example_82.review: The staff here is very nice and the set up has TVs all around the family so enjoy mostly all sports, the music is nice and pretty mellow and the place is very spacey and the prices are pretty reasonable. And most importantly is the place seems to be kept clean at all times.
Example_82.explanation: The reviewer has a positive view of the staff and cleanliness, which are significant factors in a dining experience. Reasonable prices and additional amenities like TVs and music contribute to a positive sentiment.
key_phrases: place seems to be kept clean at all times

Example_83.review: Be careful. The servers can't pay attention to save their lives, and the management cares even less. I want to make sure people know how careless the management is, particularly Mark who seems to let his staff run around.
Example_83.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with the service and management, specifically calling out an individual by name, which indicates a personal negative experience.

Example_84.review: This is a \"Okay\" place to eat. The food is nothing special. I guess what they have going for them is the beer. Order the Guacamole for the starter which was okay but for $8.50 and the portion was not worth it. Rice (Cajun Taco) was not cooked well. Would I go there again \"maybe\". If your into beer and watching the game, then yeah go there.
Example_84.explanation: The reviewer finds the food to be average and not particularly special, with specific complaints about the rice not being cooked well and the portion size not justifying the price. However, they do see some redeeming qualities in the beer and the atmosphere for watching a game.
key_phrases: Rice (Cajun Taco) was not cooked well
the portion was not worth it

Example_85.review: Good club for a good laugh. High food prices (most comedy clubs are), 2 item min. The food was less than stellar. I wouldve enjoyed Burger King more. \n\nService was decent, I believe the waiters/waitresses could hustle a little more or the club should hire more waiters/waitresses. I get grouchy when my glass is sitting empty for more than 2 mins.
Example_85.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear dissatisfaction with the food quality, comparing it unfavorably to fast food, and also notes high prices. However, they did find the service to be decent, which suggests some positive aspect.
key_phrases: The food was less than stellar
I would've enjoyed Burger King more

Example_86.review: My husband and I went to do something fun. The comedy was great! The food, however, is mediocre at best. In addition, we were seated in the last row, and 10 minutes into the headliner they sat someone else at our table, so that they were in front of us. I could not see a thing. When we received our check, they had added an 18% gratuity without permission or notification. I will not be returning anytime soon.
Example_86.explanation: The customer had a negative experience with the food quality and service, including seating arrangements and unexpected charges. The positive aspect of the comedy does not seem to outweigh the negative aspects related to the restaurant experience.
key_phrases: The food, however, is mediocre at best
I could not see a thing
they had added an 18% gratuity without permission or notification

Example_87.review: Good! I can't comment on the food or the bathrooms, but from what experienced it was great! The drinks were decent, and I believe you must order two items at minimum. The staff is quick, but they should have more people working on a Saturday night. Before you can ask for anything else they bolt to the next table or to the kitchen.\n\nThe comics we saw were funny as well. Will definitely go back!
Example_87.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear intention to return, which indicates a positive experience. The entertainment (comics) was appreciated, and the drinks met expectations. The quickness of the staff is noted as positive, though there is a suggestion for improvement on busy nights.
key_phrases: The comics we saw were funny as well

Example_88.review: Probably the most comprehensive supermarket in the county, if not all of southwestern PA. Its selection is considerably larger than what you can find in most Giant Eagles, and it has more upscale items. I live an easy walk from the Swissvale Giant Eagle, but I often drive to this location for the superior selection.
Example_88.explanation: The reviewer is highly appreciative of the supermarket's comprehensive selection and upscale items, which they consider superior to other local options, to the point of driving out of their way to shop there.

Example_89.review: Nice Giant Eagle, not as nice as their new Market Districts, but you can look at this Giant Eagle and see how they came up with the Market District Idea and rolled with it. Fresh made sushi, good cheese selection, awesome bakery.
Example_89.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the offerings such as the bakery, cheese selection, and sushi. They also acknowledge the store's influence on the Market District concept, which is seen as a positive.

Example_90.review: This is easily one of the best Giant Eagles I've ever been to. Huge. Very nice selection. Easily comparable to Whole Foods. Went to their cheese market, and was pleasantly surprised with the selection. I got Beemster Vlaskas, an amazing Gouda. Very large parking lot.
Example_90.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the store, comparing it favorably to Whole Foods, and specifically praises the cheese market and parking lot.

Example_91.review: I'm with Rachel C. on this one. You get an extra star for being a pretty Giant Eagle and a Cafe with a very decent beer selection of 6packs and individual bottles. Even though the Giant Eagle in Robinson is better in my opinion you, Waterfront Giant Eagle, are not bad and pretty close to where I live.
Example_91.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges the positive aspects of the location and selection, particularly the beer selection, and gives credit for proximity. However, there is a comparison to another location they prefer, suggesting some mixed feelings.
key_phrases: not bad and pretty close to where I live
extra star for being a pretty Giant Eagle

Example_92.review:
Such nice staff. 

I really lament the decline of the modern bookstore. I really enjoy browsing and picking up a new book. 

The store has a great selection and the staff are always helpful and kind. 

I really hope this store stays here for some. The prices are also fair and often have great discounts.
Example_92.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the staff and the selection of books in the store. They also appreciate the pricing and discounts. The lament about the decline of the modern bookstore does not reflect on the store itself but rather on the general trend, which does not affect the positive sentiment towards this particular store.
key_phrases: staff are always helpful and kind

Example_93.review: Nice venue, good food, great beer, awful service. Staying at the Sheraton here I've patronized Bar Louie a dozen times recently and they screw up the order in some fashion every single time, without exception.
Example_93.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the venue, food, and beer, but has had consistently negative experiences with the service, which is a significant aspect of dining out.
key_phrases: screw up the order in some fashion every single time

Example_94.review: Service has always been good and the food consistent, we usually come for happy hour when apps are half off and there's some great deals on drinks as well.\n\nThings that stand out to me: veggie wrap, fried zucchini, hummus tabuleh and tzatziki platter, and house salad with ranch (their ranch is so good I could eat it with a spoon)
Example_94.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with the service and consistency of the food. They also appreciate the value provided during happy hour and have specific favorite dishes.

Example_95.review: Food was ok. Waitress was a huge air head. Waited 25 min for my $7.00 beer. Only got it after I reminded her. It is just another disappointing chain restaurant disguised as a local commodity.
Example_95.explanation: The reviewer expresses dissatisfaction with the service, specifically calling out the waitress and the wait time for a beer. The food was considered only 'ok' and the overall experience was disappointing, with a negative view of the restaurant being a 'chain' rather than a 'local commodity'.
key_phrases: Waitress was a huge air head

Example_96.review: The absolute worst service I have ever had at any bar or restaraunt. And, in looking at other reviews, I am not the first. There are many options at the Waterfront, and I would suggest you try any of them; but stay far away from this place!
Example_96.explanation: The reviewer expresses extreme dissatisfaction with the service, which is a critical aspect of a dining experience. The use of 'absolute worst' indicates a very strong negative sentiment. The recommendation to 'stay far away' and the mention of other negative reviews reinforce the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: The absolute worst service I have ever had
stay far away from this place

Example_97.review: I can't even review this place. We sat ourselves and waited for a waitress to take our order, and we waited and waited until we got tired and just left. And I have to be clear it was a Saturday afternoon, maybe like 10 tables with people at them and I saw 3 waitress walking around. I think it's probably a bad idea to ignore people that come into your restaurant, especially since burgatory just opened across the street.
Example_97.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience due to poor service, as they were not attended to despite the presence of staff. The mention of leaving without being served is a strong indicator of dissatisfaction.
key_phrases: waited and waited until we got tired and just left

Example_98.review: Great environment at night! Songs going on very lively!! The food of my friends who ordered burger and fried shrimps was not that great. But I ordered chicken flatbread which was really delicious! Absolutely loved it will definitely go here again just for the flatbreads
Example_98.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the environment and their own food choice, which they found delicious and would return for, despite their friends' food being not that great.

Example_99.review: It's fun, but not as fun as Kennywood. The boardwalk food is a bit too far from the wave pool and that makes for a lot of shoes on/shoes off events. The lazy river could be much better. I did like the water slides and the Potato Patch fries, as well as the scenic location.
Example_99.explanation: The reviewer compares the fun level to another place, suggesting it falls short. They also mention a couple of inconveniences. However, they did find some aspects of the place enjoyable, such as the water slides, fries, and location.
key_phrases: The lazy river could be much better
The boardwalk food is a bit too far from the wave pool

Example_100.review: Great customer service. I was in Pittsburgh for business and needed a car to get back to the airport. I found these guys on Yelp, and the reviews were not wrong. It was easy to order the car and pick-up was prompt.
Example_100.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the customer service, found the reviews reliable, had an easy time ordering, and experienced prompt pick-up.

Example_101.review: The menu is outstanding but the pizza and beer is too expensive. For 2 personal pizzas (the size of pizza hut) 2 beers and 2 salads, we paid over $50 bucks. The personal pizzas alone were $11 each... If you want pizza and beer go somewhere else-pasta appetizers, or sandwiches... this place is good.
Example_101.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the menu but is put off by the high prices, especially for pizza and beer. The cost seems to be a significant factor in their overall experience.
key_phrases: pizza and beer is too expensive

Example_102.review: I had the deep dish pizza and it was very good! The individual size was smaller Than I expected for $12 but I wasn't starving so it was very filling. Our waitress April was very nice and attentive for how busy it was. We had about a 30 minute wait but it was worth it! I can't wait to try it again!
Example_102.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the food quality and the service, despite the smaller portion size and the wait time. They are looking forward to returning.

Example_103.review: Went there for lunch and had a decent meal. While the Mongolian Beef was beyond excellent, the Moo Goo Gai Pan was average (although I did enjoy the shrimp in it). Service was fine and decor is pleasant. For some reason I'm just not in the mood to write a detailed review - please accept my apologies.
Example_103.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the Mongolian Beef, describing it as 'beyond excellent,' which is a strong positive sentiment. The Moo Goo Gai Pan was considered average, but the inclusion of shrimp was enjoyed. The service and decor were also positively mentioned. The overall tone is positive, but not overly enthusiastic.
key_phrases: Moo Goo Gai Pan was average
Service was fine and decor is pleasant

Example_104.review: LOVE the food!!!!!! Try the bomb pop martini. The service has definitely Gone down hill in the past year. And when I've told the manger he just doesn't give a shit. It's either hit Or miss with service. But food is ALWAYS GOOD
Example_104.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment towards the food, which is a significant aspect of their experience. However, they also express dissatisfaction with the service, which has declined, and the manager's indifference to their concerns. The positive sentiment about the food is strong enough to balance out the negative sentiment about the service to some extent.
key_phrases: service has definitely Gone down hill
manger he just doesn't give a shit

Example_105.review: This was my first time at this PF Chang's and I was not impressed. The service was extremely slow even though it was a Sunday night and the restaurant was not very busy. The portions were small. \n\nThey were also playing 5 year old pop music really loud. Pop music?! Come on--this is an \"Asian Bistro.\"
Example_105.explanation: The reviewer had multiple complaints including slow service, small portions, and inappropriate music choice for the ambiance. The fact that it was not busy and yet the service was slow adds to the negative experience.
key_phrases: playing 5 year old pop music really loud

Example_106.review: Surprised how empty the restaurant was tonight.  First time at this location. Great service, but wasn't hard to do.....\n\nHad a combination Orange Shrimp and Chicken and Chicken Fried Rice. It was typical PF Changs (Very good). You can get the Fried Rice off the kids menu for $2.95 versus $8 for a big bowl off the regular menu.
Example_106.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the service and the quality of the food, which they describe as 'very good'. The comment about the restaurant being empty is neutral and more of an observation. The tip about the kids menu provides value to the review.
key_phrases: Surprised how empty the restaurant was tonight

Example_107.review: A big thank you to Chad Cynamom, manager at PF Chang's for making our anniversary night so special. He seated us, brought us drinks and told us about the menu. Every time my fiance and I go to this PF Chang's, we get the best service. Food isn't the most authentic chinese food we've ever had, hence the 4 stars. It is a bit overpriced as well, but the service makes up for it.
Example_107.explanation: The reviewer expresses gratitude and highlights the excellent service, particularly mentioning the manager by name and the special treatment received. The mention of the food not being the most authentic and the pricing being a bit high prevents a perfect score.
key_phrases: making our anniversary night so special

Example_108.review: Good quality pork fried dumpling and mongo beef. Bar service was fast and Efficent.  Good value. Not a 5 cause dragon eye tea was cold first time around and beef had minor amount of fat.  Fortune was even Postive!
Example_108.explanation: The reviewer mentions several positive aspects such as good quality food, fast service, and good value, but they also note minor issues with the tea being cold and the beef having some fat, which prevents a perfect score.
key_phrases: Good quality pork fried dumpling and mongo beef
Bar service was fast and efficient

Example_109.review: I seriously don't know why people love this place so much, the food here is horrible. The rice is never cooked properly.. And it's not even Asian food. It's fake asian food. I never come here anymore.
Example_109.explanation: The reviewer is expressing a strong negative opinion about the food quality, specifically mentioning the rice and authenticity. The use of the word 'horrible' indicates a very negative experience, and the fact that they 'never come here anymore' reinforces their dissatisfaction.
key_phrases: The rice is never cooked properly

Example_110.review: This is the fourth Changs I've eat ate. It was pretty good. The food was kinda like it had been previously frozen. Had a strange texture. Some of the changs chicken pieces was stuck together and the breading on the sweet and sour chicken was mushy and falling off the chicken. Overall still pretty good. Would eat at this one again.
Example_110.explanation: The reviewer has mixed feelings, noting both positive and negative aspects of their experience. They mention issues with the food's texture and quality, but still conclude that the experience was 'pretty good' and they would return.
key_phrases: kinda like it had been previously frozen
breading on the sweet and sour chicken was mushy

Example_111.review: Panera bread has to be the most inconsistent restaurant I have ever been to. I have posted two pictures of the strawberry poppyseed chicken salad. The first one looks delicious the second one looks like they could've used a smaller bowl. It did not even look appetizing.
Example_111.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment about the inconsistency of the restaurant, which is a significant factor in dining experiences. The visual appeal of the food is also criticized, which can affect the overall enjoyment of the meal.
key_phrases: most inconsistent restaurant I have ever been to
looks like they could've used a smaller bowl

Example_112.review: I only allow my dogs to go to Dr. Bezak. I've had a couple Chow Chow's who a lot of vets are afraid of. Doc had a Chow himself so knew what to look out for in the breed. He has taken good care of them over the years.
Example_112.explanation: The reviewer trusts Dr. Bezak exclusively with their dogs, indicating a high level of satisfaction. The mention of the vet's familiarity with the breed and the history of good care reinforces the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: only allow my dogs to go to Dr. Bezak
knew what to look out for in the breed

Example_113.review: It's not the greatest Target of all time but it still meets all of your basic needs.\n\nIf you're looking for produce, lower prices, and bigger selection in every department then head to the Target in East Liberty.
Example_113.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges that while this Target location is not the best, it still fulfills basic requirements. They suggest another location for a better experience, implying that this one is lacking in comparison.
key_phrases: meets all of your basic needs
looking for produce, lower prices, and bigger selection

Example_114.review: Watch out when it looks like something is on sale. They mark a rack or table with a big buy one get one or 50% off sign, then only some of the stuff on the rack is on sale.
Example_114.explanation: The speaker is warning others, indicating a negative experience. The expectation of a sale is not met when only some items are actually discounted, which can be misleading and frustrating for customers.
key_phrases: only some of the stuff on the rack is on sale
big buy one get one or 50% off sign

Example_115.review:
I love bed bath & beyond! 

The employees at this particular one are always available and helpful! 

The selection, plus the 20% off coupons keep me coming back, and its also where I get all of the things for my soda stream. 

Overall I will be back many, many times
Example_115.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment with phrases like 'I love', 'always available and helpful', and 'keep me coming back'. The mention of coupons and specific purchases shows satisfaction with the value and selection.
key_phrases: employees at this particular one are always available and helpful

Example_116.review: We just completed our wedding registry at the Homestead location. The customer service was outstanding! One of the employees, Chris, walked around with us to help us pick out exactly what we needed. The wedding registry coordinator, Christina, was also very helpful and accommodating. They treated us as if we were royalty. I would recommend this wedding registry without a doubt!
Example_116.explanation: The review is highly positive, focusing on the excellent customer service and the feeling of being treated exceptionally well. The recommendation without a doubt indicates a very positive experience.
key_phrases: treated us as if we were royalty
I would recommend this wedding registry without a doubt

Example_117.review: Much like every other Eat 'n Park (3 or 4 stars worth of chain-diner food), except the last five times I've been here, the service has been damn, damn, daaaaaaaamn slow. It's always fun to see the staff smoking out back while I've waited an hour for some scrambled eggs.
Example_117.explanation: The reviewer expresses significant frustration with the service speed, emphasizing it with repeated 'damn' and noting a long wait time for a simple dish. The mention of staff behavior negatively impacts the sentiment. However, the reviewer also implies that the food quality is acceptable, as they compare it to other locations of the chain.
key_phrases: service has been damn, damn, daaaaaaaamn slow
waited an hour for some scrambled eggs

Example_118.review: God i hate eat n park. Only reason i have gone is for the salad bar because u cant find a decent salad bar in this city. Just about every entree iv had here is nothing more than rubbish, except maybe the cheesteak. Only go if u have little kids
Example_118.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong dislike for the restaurant, with the word 'hate' indicating a strong negative sentiment. They also describe the entrees as 'rubbish', which is a clear negative opinion. The only slightly positive aspect is the mention of the salad bar, but it's more of a necessity than a preference.
key_phrases: every entree iv had here is nothing more than rubbish
God i hate eat n park
Only go if u have little kids

Example_119.review: Went in here to grab a last minute item I needed for an outfit. I wasn't going to hold my breath here either, I know it's a Marshalls and that doesn't always mean the best selection. It's hit or miss no matter what you are looking for.\n\nThis day, was a hit, maybe even a home run. I do have to admit, the Kenneth Cole shirt I got not only looked great on me, but made my wallet feel even better!
Example_119.explanation: The reviewer had low expectations ('I wasn't going to hold my breath') but was pleasantly surprised ('This day, was a hit, maybe even a home run'). The positive outcome is emphasized by the satisfaction with the shirt ('looked great on me') and the value for money ('made my wallet feel even better').
key_phrases: made my wallet feel even better

Example_120.review:
Got lunch from here today. 

What I sampled: 
Maine Lobster Bisque (delicious and the whole reason for getting lunch from here)
Cheeseburger (decent version I only ate about half, but I expect the other half won't last long)

Overall I enjoy going here, though it is a bit overpriced, but sometimes I am just in the mood for that lobster bisque!
Example_120.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment towards the Maine Lobster Bisque, which was the main reason for their visit. They also enjoy the overall experience at the restaurant despite acknowledging that it is a bit overpriced. The cheeseburger was considered decent, indicating a generally positive experience.
key_phrases: delicious and the whole reason for getting lunch from here

Example_121.review: Service was slow, but that was because one of our party insisted that the bartender, her favorite server, serve us in our private room for a party of 8. The food and drinks were good and we woud return.
Example_121.explanation: While the service was slow, it was due to a specific request from the party, not the restaurant's general performance. The positive experience with the food and drinks outweighs the slower service, and the intention to return indicates a generally positive experience.

Example_122.review: The service was mostly friendly but I was disappointed in my meal. My meal was way over cooked. The soda was flat and the carbonation needed changed and I felt like we inconvenienced our server by asking for new ones. Overall, I thought it was mediocre and I was expecting more for the prices.
Example_122.explanation: The customer had a negative experience with both the food and the service. The overcooked meal and flat soda indicate a poor dining experience, and feeling like an inconvenience to the server suggests dissatisfaction with the service.
key_phrases: My meal was way over cooked

Example_123.review: The food was really good, but the prices were pretty high and the portions were on the small side. The desserts were the high point of the meal for me. I got the \"shark fin\" pie and it was really good. The waitress thought I wouldn't be able to finish it... but I showed her. Take that, waitress.
Example_123.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with the quality of the food, especially the desserts, which they found to be the highlight. However, they also mention the negative aspects of high prices and small portions. The overall sentiment is positive due to the emphasis on the food's quality.
key_phrases: The desserts were the high point of the meal for me
but the prices were pretty high and the portions were on the small side

Example_124.review: Food was only ok. Had lobster bisque soup not to good. Had the shang Hai Seafood Sampler. The scallops were hard, over cooked. The samon was good. Shrimp had no flavor. I will say the service was the best. Our waiter was great!!
Example_124.explanation: The reviewer expresses disappointment with multiple dishes, indicating that the food did not meet their expectations. However, they had a positive experience with the service, which slightly improves the overall sentiment.
key_phrases: Had lobster bisque soup not too good

Example_125.review: Beautiful decor. Very genuine staff. Very clean washrooms. Delicious food. I tried the market trio. The blackened tilapia was nice with a little bit of spice. This is a great place for a seafood lover.
Example_125.explanation: The reviewer provides a positive assessment of multiple aspects of the restaurant, including the food, decor, staff, cleanliness, and specific dishes.

Example_126.review: I have eaten some very good dinners here. Although it's a chain, I would say it's several notches above the other chain restaurants. The chef here seems to add some creativity to the menu, so I will be definitely back again soon.
Example_126.explanation: The reviewer has had positive dining experiences, appreciates the quality as being higher than other chains, and notes the chef's creativity. The intention to return soon indicates a positive sentiment.
key_phrases: several notches above the other chain restaurants
chef here seems to add some creativity to the menu

Example_127.review: In the Homestead area of Pittsburgh. Seafood gumbo was very good.\nBroiled scallops were very good, partner had sea bass stuffed with lobster, also very good. Vegetable sides were not as good as the fish. With two glasses of wine the total was $83. In and out in an hour.\nI'd go back because the fish was that good
Example_127.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the seafood dishes, mentioning multiple items that were 'very good.' The only negative aspect was the vegetable sides, which were not up to par with the fish. However, the overall experience was positive enough that the reviewer would return.

Example_128.review: Very bad purchase experience. I bought a shirt with a hole covered in the rolled up sleeves, but they denied my request to return it. I am so angery at this and will never shop their chothes anymore.
Example_128.explanation: The customer had a negative experience due to a defective product and poor customer service, as indicated by the denial of a return request. The strong language used ('Very bad', 'so angry', 'never shop') suggests a high level of dissatisfaction.
key_phrases: denied my request to return it
bought a shirt with a hole

Example_129.review: living alone I love the 5 for $20 deals they have on meat. I also love Faygo products when I have a party or bbq so their sales are always right on time. They don't have as many stores in the area but they are worth checking out. The lines are a lot shorter and the staff is a lot friendlier.
Example_129.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiment by using the word 'love' twice in reference to deals and products. They also appreciate the shorter lines and friendlier staff, which adds to the positive experience.

Example_130.review: This store has changed hands many times over the past few years and it shows. Fifteen years ago if you didn't get there by 9am you would have fight a crowd. Now it never seems all that busy. Many of the store's best and dedicated employees left or were let go (about five years ago) and product lines change with each new owner. The most recent owner seems to be improving the store and employee turnover has seemed to slow.
Example_130.explanation: The review starts with a negative history of the store but ends on a positive note about the current owner's improvements and reduced employee turnover.
key_phrases: The most recent owner seems to be improving the store
This store has changed hands many times
Many of the store's best and dedicated employees left or were let go
