Example_131.review: By far the worst McDonald's in the world. Employees are to busy playing grab ass behind the counter, to get your order correct. Ninety percent of the time you receive the wrong order, after waiting what seems an eternity. I've even enjoyed the experience of going through the drive thru, only to get home and find no beef patties on my Big Mac. Save yourself the aggravation, and do not go here.
Example_131.explanation: The reviewer expresses extreme dissatisfaction with the service and the accuracy of the orders. The use of hyperbole ('By far the worst McDonald's in the world') and the detailed complaints about the employees and the incorrect orders indicate a very negative experience.
key_phrases: By far the worst McDonald's in the world
Ninety percent of the time you receive the wrong order
Employees are too busy playing grab ass behind the counter

Example_132.review: By far the absolute worst Mcdonalds in the\nWorld. You can pretty much rest assured that, after your long wait in the drive thru, your order will most definitely be wrong. Calls to the owner go ignored. Rice Enterprises own a majority of the McDonalds in the South Hills. They have all gone down hill in quality, service and cleanliness. The owner has to be the problem.
Example_132.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their experience, indicating a high level of dissatisfaction with multiple aspects of the restaurant, including the quality, service, cleanliness, and management.
key_phrases: your order will most definitely be wrong
Calls to the owner go ignored

Example_133.review: Underated and ignored! if you see this ol time pizzaria near Kennywood stop on by good crust nice and buttery in the sicilian style! Better then DiSallas the only thing I can say that is better then Latinas is Mineo's ! they say the best pizzarias are the little holes in the wall type places and this is one of those enviroments! Small and cozy very nice and relaxing afternoon! To just enjoy with yourself and a friend!
Example_133.explanation: The reviewer is enthusiastic about the quality of the pizza, comparing it favorably to other well-known places, and appreciates the cozy atmosphere of the restaurant.

Example_134.review: Pizza is very hit or miss. When the owners are there, it's really good. When they aren't, you get pizza that is over cooked (more like burnt) and LONG delivery times. The pizza, even when plain, is very greasy. Way more than other places around. Usually pizza that greasy is caused by low quality cheese. Also they do not take credit or debit cards. There are better options.
Example_134.explanation: The inconsistency of the pizza quality is a significant issue, with negative experiences when the owners are not present. Complaints about overcooked pizza, long delivery times, and greasiness suggest dissatisfaction. The mention of low quality cheese and the lack of payment options further indicate a negative experience. However, there is a positive note that the pizza is good when the owners are present.
key_phrases: Pizza is very hit or miss

Example_135.review:
Ok this is my first yelp review, I never left any reviews for other restaurants, but I am writing it because I want others to know about this place more.

Restaurant run by family. very friendly, clean cooking environment, and Great food. I would come to this place again and again whenever I visit Pittsburgh.

Its less than 10min drive from Kennywood, if you are visiting Kennywood you should definitely try this place.
Example_135.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the positive aspects of the restaurant, such as the quality of the food, the friendliness and cleanliness, and their willingness to return multiple times. The mention of the restaurant being family-run adds a personal touch that is often viewed positively.
key_phrases: I would come to this place again and again

Example_136.review:
Came here from PGH for the first time. This bakery is legit. I bought some Rye bread and Italian 5 grain. Delicious. A strange snickerdoodle thing with pink frosting. Delicious. Chocolate chip cookie dipped in chocolate, extra chewy and humongous. Delicious.

And a sweet old lady serving em up.

The best.

Delicious.
Example_136.explanation: The repeated use of the word 'Delicious' to describe multiple items indicates a very positive experience. The term 'legit' suggests authenticity and high quality, and 'The best' is a strong endorsement. The mention of a 'sweet old lady' adds a positive personal touch to the service.
key_phrases: sweet old lady serving em up

Example_137.review: Well for my first time here I was way less than impressed. The lady at the front counter was a crab and the Pierogies really weren't that great. Rather than be kind and answering my questions I settled with the potato and cheese pierogies. I guess Bloomfield Bridge tavern or Mrs. T's is still my go to place. And plus this place is way out of my way to be treated poorly. I wouldn't go back
Example_137.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations for their first visit but was disappointed with both the service ('The lady at the front counter was a crab') and the food ('Pierogies really weren't that great'). They also mention a preference for other places and the inconvenience of the location.
key_phrases: The lady at the front counter was a crab

Example_138.review: OMG good pierogis in a classic blue collar 'hood. At first glance, it looks like a place to get a flat fixed on your tire. Instead, I re-learn why I always avoid the corporate food franchises and seek places like this out. Just go there and eat whatever the nice woman behind the counter tells you to! It's well worth the mapquest ...
Example_138.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of enthusiasm for the pierogis and the overall experience, suggesting a strong positive sentiment. They also appreciate the location's authenticity and the recommendation to follow the counter staff's suggestions.

Example_139.review: Have been here two times after stopping at Mancini's Bakery. Have only had the Hamburger/Cheese/Bacon w/ fries but huge portions and great price. Great Quality also. Server is really nice also. Will be eating here again. Heard the Breakfast items are also great. Saw the waffles and pancakes....were huge!
Example_139.explanation: The reviewer has had positive experiences with the food quality, portion size, and pricing. They also had a positive interaction with the server and express a desire to return, indicating a positive sentiment.

Example_140.review: Very quaint! Stopped here for lunch while traveling for work, and I felt like I was in a diner in the 1950s. Had a grilled cheese and fries - the food was good and everyone was friendly.
Example_140.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, noting the good food and friendly staff. The atmosphere was also appreciated, adding to the overall positive sentiment.

Example_141.review: They do great quality work. The only reason I did not give them five stars is for their lack of customer courtesy not once but twice. I am a very patient and understanding person, but being rude twice means you dont want my business and I tipped 20%.
Example_141.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges the high quality of the food or service ('great quality work') but has had negative experiences with customer service ('lack of customer courtesy' and 'being rude twice'). The negative experiences were significant enough to prevent a perfect score despite the customer's patience and generous tipping ('I tipped 20%').

Example_142.review: I stop by here frequently when I am on my way to work for breakfast. The drive thru is fast but they do tend to get the order wrong. But I will say that I have had more free meals here due to them comping me for all messed up orders. \n\nThe staff is friendly.
Example_142.explanation: The reviewer frequently visits the restaurant, indicating some level of satisfaction. However, they note a significant issue with incorrect orders. The positive aspect is the staff's friendliness and the compensation for mistakes, which seems to mitigate the frustration.
key_phrases: they do tend to get the order wrong
I have had more free meals here due to them comping me for all messed up orders

Example_145.review: Delivery is slow and not even close to the best Chinese in the area. No matter if it's rice or noodles or chicken or pork, everything tastes off--like it's been overcooked in mop-bucket-water. Try House of Lee instead.
Example_145.explanation: The reviewer is highly dissatisfied with the taste of the food, comparing it to being overcooked in mop-bucket-water, which is a very negative description. They also complain about the slow delivery and suggest that this is not the best Chinese food available in the area.

Example_146.review: I got a pedicure here. Not bad, they were pretty thorough. But two days later both of my big toes were infected and oozing pus where she trimmed my toenails on the sides (which was weird anyway). I hate to rate a local shop down, but man my toes hurt.
Example_146.explanation: The reviewer starts with a neutral comment about the thoroughness of the pedicure, but the subsequent severe negative experience with an infection overshadows the initial sentiment. The reviewer's reluctance to rate the shop down indicates that the negative aspects were significant enough to overcome that reluctance.
key_phrases: both of my big toes were infected and oozing pus
Not bad, they were pretty thorough
I hate to rate a local shop down

Example_147.review:
This is my favorite 'event' restaurant (by which I mean, spendy, but definitely worth it for special occasions). It is great for intimate birthdays, celebrations, etc. Whatever karmic intervention gave the 'Bustling Borough of Bellevue' this restaurant makes me think we, as a community, has done something right. 

But more importantly the food... Oh, the food! The owner/chef takes so much care, it makes the whole experience very enjoyable. I have never had a bad meal. 

I
Example_147.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong preference for this restaurant, highlighting its suitability for special occasions and the care taken by the owner/chef. The absence of any negative experiences with the meals is a strong positive indicator.
key_phrases: I have never had a bad meal
definitely worth it for special occasions

Example_148.review: Quite possibly the best bakery in Pittsburgh. It's got everything from the low-end (cookies, cupcakes, donuts) to the high (wedding cakes, tortes, tarts). Make any special or large orders weeks in advance. The tastiest wedding cake I ever sampled was from here: smooth buttercream icing with alternating raspberry and lemon filling in white batter.
Example_148.explanation: The reviewer expresses high praise for the bakery, indicating a wide selection of baked goods and specifically highlighting the quality of the wedding cake they sampled.
key_phrases: tastiest wedding cake I ever sampled
smooth buttercream icing with alternating raspberry and lemon filling

Example_149.review: Lincoln Bakery makes very delicious donuts, pastries, and desserts. Their bread selection, however, was very limited and upon making our choice the quality of the bread was mediocre. We were also disappointed that many of the things in the shop are not labeled and when the store is busy it can be difficult to find staff to explain what different options are. Still, this should be a go to for a local bakery if you are looking for something sweet.
Example_149.explanation: The review starts positively with high praise for the bakery's sweet offerings, but then it points out several negatives such as a limited bread selection, mediocre quality of bread, and issues with labeling and staff availability. However, the review ends on a positive note, suggesting it as a go-to place for sweet items.
key_phrases: very delicious donuts, pastries, and desserts
quality of the bread was mediocre
disappointed that many of the things in the shop are not labeled

Example_150.review: Got a key lime pie from this place. It was horrid. Icing was stale cake thick, crust was not even crunchy or had taste, and the key lime was weak. Pie looked it it was sitting out for a day or 2.
Example_150.explanation: The reviewer uses strong negative language to describe their dissatisfaction with the key lime pie, indicating a very poor experience with the food's quality.
key_phrases: Pie looked it it was sitting out for a day or 2

Example_151.review: Everytime I eat at this location I end up with a sick stomach. I don't have that problem at other Arby's. The dining area is clean and everything else seems ok but I always get a sick stomach. Maybe they should relook at their food prep.
Example_151.explanation: The reviewer consistently getting sick after eating at this location is a serious complaint, which strongly suggests a negative experience. However, they note that the dining area is clean, which is a small positive aspect.
key_phrases: end up with a sick stomach
I don't have that problem at other Arby's
Maybe they should relook at their food prep

Example_152.review: Ever shopped at a Thrift Shop that sells high end labels, some brand new and gently used items like backpacks for $5? This is a great place to discover unique things. They also have daily deals such as 1/2 off of certain color tags. Have to dig through other things though to find something interesting which is part of the adventure!
Example_152.explanation: The reviewer expresses enthusiasm about the unique finds and deals available at the shop. The mention of 'high end labels' and 'daily deals' indicates a positive experience. The process of searching is seen as an adventure, which adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: great place to discover unique things
daily deals such as 1/2 off of certain color tags

Example_153.review: Love the store. Great stuff, High price. Buyer BEWARE of the RUDE cashier SYLVIA, extremely unpleasant, unwilling to help and always with NEGATIVE attitude. She needs customer service training....Someone please tell her to stop complaining about other customers or employees....Cashier that does window display is always kind, friendly and helpful.
Example_153.explanation: The review starts positively with praise for the store and its products, but the sentiment quickly turns negative due to the reviewer's experience with a specific employee. The negative experience with the cashier seems to outweigh the positive aspects mentioned.
key_phrases: extremely unpleasant, unwilling to help and always with NEGATIVE attitude

Example_154.review: nice and clean with well organized large selection but was expensive. I was looking for some twin size thin cotton blankets easy to wash and hang dry for my dog and the prices were $14.99 of course somewere high quality items which u would have to pay new retail store price $40-50 but still overpriced. I finally found a small blanket for $7 on sale.
Example_154.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the cleanliness and organization of the place, as well as the selection, but feels that the prices are too high. However, they did find an item on sale, which slightly mitigates the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: nice and clean with well organized large selection

Example_155.review: I've been going here since I was a wee tot. I have always enjoyed their food even though there's nothing too special about it. I really like their breakfast menu. You always seem to get lots of food for very little money, which is nice. \n\nMy only complaint is that it is WAY TOO SMALL and always very busy. They should really look at expanding the restaurant.
Example_155.explanation: The reviewer has a long-term positive relationship with the restaurant and enjoys the breakfast menu and the value for money. The complaint about the size and busyness of the restaurant suggests a minor inconvenience rather than a deal-breaker.
key_phrases: I really like their breakfast menu
get lots of food for very little money

Example_156.review: A great Pittsburgh diner with friendly service and good diner food. If there are any problems, the prices a bit high for diner food and, as others have said, it's extremely cramped. Otherwise, it's an enjoyable place to eat and the food is, indeed, very good.
Example_156.explanation: The review starts positively, highlighting the friendly service and good food. However, it also mentions two negatives: high prices and cramped space. The overall sentiment remains positive as the reviewer concludes with the diner being an enjoyable place with very good food.
key_phrases: friendly service and good diner food
prices a bit high for diner food

Example_157.review:
Thank You Kim and Kurt! It was very nice of you guys to take the time to post your reviews on our service. We really appreciate it. We hope your clocks will continue to do well for years to come. Please dont hesitate to give us a call if there's anything else we can do for you.

Lisa
Paul's Clock Repair
Example_157.explanation: The response is expressing gratitude and appreciation towards the customers for their reviews. The tone is positive and thankful, with an offer of continued service.

Example_158.review: Animal Elegance is not much on the outside but the owner was very nice & LISTENED to how I wanted my teacup poodle groomed and used the products that I requested.\nI was very happy with my services and I will return. \n My poodles groom was $50,including tip, which I think is very reasonable.
Example_158.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the service provided and the owner's attentiveness. The price was also considered reasonable. The only slight negative was the external appearance of the place.

Example_159.review: I made it back here about two weeks ago. I must say the experience was night and day compared to the one at the end of July. Whether or not it was an off night I do not know, but the place was loud and crowded, the service was bad, and the food was mediocre at best. I should have just waited it out at Point Brugge. I won't becoming back anytime soon.
Example_159.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience with both the food quality and the service. The environment was also not pleasant for them. The statement about not returning anytime soon indicates a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: the food was mediocre at best

Example_160.review: I've been told several times that this place had a great brunch. Upon arrival, the menu was very limited and the service was abysmal despite a nearly empty restaurant. We literally waited 15 mins. at our table and then left prior to ordering.
Example_160.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations due to recommendations but was let down by both the limited menu and particularly the poor service, which was so bad they left before ordering.

Example_161.review: The food here is ok but not worth the price. $15 corking fee? $9 a glass of garbage wine? Me thinks not.\n\nWhat really tops it off is the owner is beyond rude and doesn't care about the business. I heard it used to be much better but now I don't know anyone who eats there...
Example_161.explanation: The reviewer expresses dissatisfaction with the value for money, specifically mentioning high prices for what they consider subpar offerings. The comment about the owner's rudeness and lack of care for the business adds a significant negative sentiment. The only slightly positive note is that the food is 'ok,' but this is overshadowed by the negative aspects.

Example_162.review: Another really good meal here! My friend and I went for soup and appetizers--and licked the plates clean! Gazpacho, pasta fagiole, homemade bread, eggplant with mozzarella and my favorite...the roasted veggie platter. So much food we didn't think we would eat it, but it was so good we did! They also had their doors open and we were able to sit outside in the cool summer air--great way to kick of summer!
Example_162.explanation: The phrases used indicate a very positive experience. 'Licked the plates clean' and 'so good we did' suggest that the food was enjoyed thoroughly. The mention of a 'great way to kick off summer' adds to the positive sentiment by associating the dining experience with a pleasant seasonal event.
key_phrases: great way to kick off summer

Example_163.review: Nice atmosphere with above average food. This restaurant has a lot of potential. The wait staff was far below average: They were slow, and we had to ask multiple times for things. They were not the most polite wait staff, and our waitress was either a little demeaning or very socially awkward.
Example_163.explanation: The review starts positively by mentioning a nice atmosphere and above average food, which suggests some satisfaction. However, the sentiment shifts significantly with the criticism of the wait staff, which is a crucial aspect of the dining experience. The reviewer's negative experience with the service outweighs the positive comments about the atmosphere and food.
key_phrases: wait staff was far below average
Nice atmosphere with above average food
This restaurant has a lot of potential

Example_164.review: Definitely overpriced for what they offered. Took my car in to check my AC, they didn't get back to me for the whole day, and decided to fix whatever the problem was without asking me and charging me an insane about (approximately $150 more than most places). Definitely will not go back there again.
Example_164.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment by stating the service was overpriced and communication was poor. They also highlight a lack of consent for repairs and excessive charges.
key_phrases: didn't get back to me for the whole day
decided to fix whatever the problem was without asking me

Example_165.review: Been yelled at by other customers (today for instance)...place is super ghetto...avoid at all cost. Today, left a full cart bacause a woman (with a baby in a stoller) shouted at me for \"cutting in line\". Will never go back. At night it is a nightmare.
Example_165.explanation: The reviewer had a very negative experience with other customers and the atmosphere of the place, which led them to decide never to return. The use of strong language like 'super ghetto' and 'avoid at all cost' indicates a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: Been yelled at by other customers

Example_166.review: Nothing spectacular, but I go there regularly, and generally get a cut that works fine for at least a couple of months. They did a good job after I had a botched cut overseas (hairdressers in Japan are, understandably, not necessarily qualified to work on non-Asian hair, as they don't cut a lot of it). Parking can be tough, depending on time of day--there's a shared private lot, but it's small.
Example_166.explanation: The reviewer seems to have a neutral to slightly positive experience. They don't find the place spectacular, but it's reliable enough for regular visits. The mention of a good job done after a botched cut adds a positive note, while the parking issue is a minor inconvenience.

Example_167.review: i'm not sure why this place has bad reviews. its par for thecourse for supercuts. standard cut 16.95 is a bit pricy but they always do exactly what I say. i've simple hair so it works well for me. employees are generally nice, sometimes like talking to me sometimes talk just to each other, worth three stars for sure.
Example_167.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges the higher price but appreciates that the haircut meets their expectations and the employees' demeanor is generally positive. The explicit mention of 'worth three stars for sure' directly indicates the reviewer's sentiment.
key_phrases: always do exactly what I say

Example_168.review: I went there today! The cut was terrible! I have an awful experience. They lady that cut my hair was nice but she wanted to leave early so she made a disaster in my head!
Example_168.explanation: The reviewer had a very negative experience with the quality of the haircut, which is the primary service of the business. Despite the hairdresser being nice, the outcome of the service was poor.
key_phrases: she made a disaster in my head

Example_169.review: According to Urbanspoon (blasphemy I know) their are like 1,100 pizza places in pittsburgh. So what is the best pizza in Pittsburgh. Everyone has an opinion and so here is mine: The best pizza in Pittsburgh is the pie comes from the place in you neighborhood that has quality ingredients, fair prices, and friendly service. Eddie's Pizza Place is all of these things and since I live in this neighborhood this is my favorite.
Example_169.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the importance of quality, price, and service in determining the best pizza. They conclude that Eddie's Pizza Place meets all these criteria and is their favorite, indicating a positive experience.
key_phrases: Eddie's Pizza Place is all of these things

Example_171.review: This is a Pittsburgh/Shadyside institution.\n\nWhat can I say, this place is good-eatin' basic Italian food! Not spectacular, but when you want a good nuthin-fancy dinner, this is the place to go. The pizza is outstanding.
Example_171.explanation: The reviewer seems to appreciate the restaurant for what it is—a place for good, basic Italian food. They have a particularly high opinion of the pizza, calling it outstanding, which is a strong positive. The phrase 'Not spectacular' indicates that while the food is good, it doesn't exceed expectations.
key_phrases: this place is good-eatin' basic Italian food

Example_172.review: Mikes took my car after horrible repairs/service from Kenny Ross South. The service was great and I even got to meet the owner who came out to personally speak with me on a busy Friday afternoon. Great guys there.
Example_172.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with the service and appreciated the personal touch of meeting the owner. The mention of 'Great guys there' reinforces the positive sentiment.

Example_173.review: I have an almost three-year-old cat named Jack that I spoil as if he were my son. I honestly never experienced the love for and from an animal until I adopted Jack from an Animal Rescue League. It was one of the best decisions I've ever made.\n\nThe shelter is great and I'll probably get another cat in the near future. Check this location out!
Example_173.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by stating the decision to adopt was one of the best they've made, indicating a high level of satisfaction with the shelter. They also praise the shelter directly and suggest they would return, which implies a positive experience.
key_phrases: one of the best decisions I've ever made
I'll probably get another cat in the near future

Example_175.review: The times I've been here, its been an OK experience. However, their store hours are absolutely terrible. Closing at 7pm basically means they're never open when I would need to go there. Despite this being more conveniently located, Walgreens and Target end up getting most of my quick-shop business, simply due to late hours at night when I need to cook, clean, realize I'm out of toothpaste, have a headache, need a last-minute birthday card or whatever.
Example_175.explanation: The reviewer has a neutral to negative view of the experience, mainly due to the inconvenience of the store hours. They acknowledge the location is convenient but are forced to go elsewhere due to the hours of operation.
key_phrases: Closing at 7pm basically means they're never open when I would need to go there

Example_176.review: This place is a disaster. I made an appointment online for 5:30PM. When I got there they refused me service, asserting they close at 6:00PM. Nevermind that online published hours are from 7AM to 7PM. Furthermore, their own system sent me a confirmation email for my 5:30PM appointment. Finally, this building is an absolute dump... Goodyear should be ashamed to have the brand attached to it.
Example_176.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with the service, the discrepancy between the published hours and the actual service hours, and the state of the building. The use of strong negative language indicates a very negative experience.

Example_177.review: I'm a lawyer in NY and I'm visiting a friend in Pittsburgh. I am blown away by the code violations in this unit. The tenants said they have reported these issues to the owner and to no avail. I am hoping to direct these tenants to a lawyer in PA.
Example_177.explanation: The reviewer is expressing a strong negative sentiment by being 'blown away' by the severity of the code violations. The fact that these issues have been reported with no resolution adds to the negative sentiment. The intention to seek legal help for the tenants reinforces the seriousness of the complaints.
key_phrases: blown away by the code violations
reported these issues to the owner and to no avail
hoping to direct these tenants to a lawyer

Example_178.review: The coffee here was excellent! Had a double espresso. Apparently their roaster is in Santa Cruz Ca. Large selection of French Press Coffees. Baked goods did not look too great but that is not why I came here. Atmosphere is very mellow and comfortable. Also has Wifi which works! Nice to find a place like this when traveling. Is in the middle of a residential area and there doesnt seem to be anything else around here.
Example_178.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the coffee, selection, and atmosphere, which are significant aspects of a coffee shop experience. The mention of the baked goods not looking great is a minor point compared to the overall positive feedback.
key_phrases: Large selection of French Press Coffees
Atmosphere is very mellow and comfortable

Example_179.review:
Reasons:

1. LOCATION and setting: Highland Park is simply lovely - makes you feel as if you are in a small English town, where time has stood still. The art and small tables inside and outside are charming.
2. Socially Responsible:Fair trade and international array of coffee.
3. Fresh Meat: Local pasture raised meat/ local produce in their tasty panini's.
4. Nice crowd and staff.
Example_179.explanation: The reviewer provides a list of positive aspects about the location, social responsibility, food quality, and the atmosphere created by both the crowd and the staff.

Example_180.review: The coffee here is amazing (I love when the baristas take the effort to make patterns in the foam). The baristas were extremely friendly and the pastries looked delicious. While there are a number of tables, Enrico's was busy even on a Friday night...I would imagine that it would be hard to find a table during peak hours.
Example_180.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the quality of the coffee and the friendliness of the baristas. Positive remarks about the pastries add to the positive sentiment. The only potential negative is the difficulty in finding a table, which is also an indirect compliment to the popularity of the place.

Example_181.review: Great variety of coffee and methods (press, Chemex, pour-over). I did not get a chance to try to the espresso, but it looked very good as well. Verve and Olympia are two very solid roasters and provide a wealth of choices. \n\nStaff was very helpful, location great. All around a good place in Pittsburgh.
Example_181.explanation: The reviewer expresses satisfaction with the variety of coffee and brewing methods, compliments the staff and location, and has a positive overall impression of the place.
key_phrases: Great variety of coffee and methods
Staff was very helpful, location great

Example_182.review:
BEST COFFEE IN PITTSBURGH!

You might think there is better coffee elsewhere. You're wrong!

I love this coffee shop, and there is a second location the Gates Building at CMU that I like to go to--their panini are to die for.

I love this place, and you will too!
Example_182.explanation: The use of all caps in 'BEST COFFEE IN PITTSBURGH!' indicates strong positive sentiment. The reviewer expresses love for the coffee shop and makes a bold claim that there is no better coffee elsewhere, which shows high satisfaction. The mention of a specific item, the panini, as 'to die for' further emphasizes their positive experience.

Example_183.review: Best coffee it Pittsburgh? Maybe, but this place is certainly competitive. French Press, Drip, espresso, or pour over? You name it they've got it. Only downside of this place is a limited food and pastry selection. If it is just coffee you want you this is the place. It is it a bit snobbish sure, but not nearly as much as many of the other coffee shops in Pittsburgh.
Example_183.explanation: The reviewer starts with a high praise, suggesting the coffee could be the best in Pittsburgh and acknowledges the wide selection of coffee preparation methods. The criticism is mild, focusing on the limited food selection and a slightly snobbish atmosphere, which does not seem to detract significantly from the overall positive experience.

Example_184.review:
We ordered a double espresso which looked more like a single shot. Cozy coffeeshop with an ample amount of seating.

There were different types of coffee available for purchase to drink there and beans to take home.

Cute neighborhood coffeeshop type feel.
Example_184.explanation: The customer had a negative experience with the size of the espresso but had positive remarks about the atmosphere and variety of the coffeeshop.
key_phrases: looked more like a single shot

Example_185.review: went in as a guest of a friend of mine who is a member there... nice atmosphere. LOT of oldddd folks and they seem to market themselves as \"Silver Fitness\" sort of fitness center... (this may be a turn-off for some younger people.)\nthey had a lot of machines and exercise gear ... 2 pools and tan beds/etc /etc. \ni'd probably prefer personally to work out somewhere with a younger crowd.
Example_185.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the nice atmosphere but has a preference for a younger crowd. The mention of 'Silver Fitness' and the older demographic is not necessarily negative but indicates a personal preference.
key_phrases: prefer personally to work out somewhere with a younger crowd

Example_186.review: Delicious wings - sometimes a bit too deep fried for my taste, but really tasty flavors and spices. We went for all-you-can-eat wings night but sadly I could barely finish my first dozen. Beer selection is much improved since Turadg A.'s post; they have about 30 or so available to choose from.
Example_186.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the taste of the wings and the variety of flavors and spices. They also note an improvement in the beer selection. The slight negative is that the wings are sometimes too deep fried for their personal preference.

Example_187.review: The food here is okay. Wings, BBQ, Bar foods. The floor here is always super slippery. It doesn't matter if I am wearing heels or sneakers. I just don't get why the floor is like and ice skating rink.
Example_187.explanation: The reviewer finds the food to be average but has a significant safety concern about the floor being slippery, which affects the overall experience negatively.
key_phrases: floor here is always super slippery

Example_188.review: The front serves as a good Pittsburgh sports bar. It's a particularly great place to watch the Penguins in the spring when they open up the front wall. There are lots of HDTV's and there is a good selection of beer. \n\nThe food, however, is bland and is terrible bbq, even for the northeast. I would not come here unless you want to watch a game that you cannot see at home.
Example_188.explanation: The reviewer seems to enjoy the atmosphere for watching sports and the selection of beer, but has a very negative view of the food, calling it bland and terrible. The recommendation to only come for watching a game implies that the dining experience is not worthwhile.
key_phrases: food, however, is bland and is terrible bbq
I would not come here unless you want to watch a game

Example_189.review: Good fun place to watch games while drinking and eating chicken wings or sandwiches.They have a good selection of wings and decent beer. I try different kinds of wings every time I go in but so far spicy garlic has been my favorite. This is a typical sports bar.
Example_189.explanation: The reviewer expresses positive sentiments about the atmosphere, the selection of wings, and the beer. They also mention a favorite item, indicating a positive experience.

Example_190.review: Good place to watch a sports game. Beer specials were good. Food is very overpriced though. The wings are about the worst I've ever had... and I've had alot of wings growing up in Buffalo, NY.
Example_190.explanation: The reviewer has a strong negative opinion about the wings, which is significant given their experience with wings from Buffalo, NY. The complaint about the food being overpriced adds to the negative sentiment. However, there are positive comments about the place being good for watching sports and the beer specials.
key_phrases: wings are about the worst I've ever had
Good place to watch a sports game

Example_191.review: Their food is okay and beer selection is diverse and good. \n\nThe problem i have with the place is that Buffalo Bills fans congregate here and cheer on every mediocre play their football team makes, (or almost makes) so it's like watching the Superbowl except it's a losing record team stopping a team on third down.
Example_191.explanation: The reviewer finds the food to be average but appreciates the good beer selection. The main issue seems to be the atmosphere created by the Buffalo Bills fans, which the reviewer finds annoying, especially when they cheer mediocre plays.
key_phrases: beer selection is diverse and good

Example_192.review: Went here this past Saturday afternoon, 11/2. My friends and I sat at the pretty much empty bar for over 5 minutes with no service. The bartender walked by us a few times and didn't even acknowledge we were there. As we walked out, we saw the bartender on the phone and other staff members standing in the back chatting. We went next door to Mad Mex and got much better service!
Example_192.explanation: The lack of service is a significant negative aspect of the dining experience. The reviewer also emphasizes the indifference of the bartender and the staff, which adds to the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: bartender walked by us a few times and didn't even acknowledge
staff members standing in the back chatting

Example_193.review: Loved the hot vegetarian sandwich. Not easy to find veggie dishes which don't feel like a compromise. This was great. Excellent service from waitress Ariella with the long black pony tail (don't know her last name). Nice casual atmosphere. Resonable prices.
Example_193.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by using the word 'Loved' to describe their enjoyment of the vegetarian sandwich. They also appreciate the service provided by a specific waitress and the atmosphere of the restaurant. The mention of reasonable prices adds to the positive sentiment.

Example_194.review: The location is convenient but I was not a fan of the food. I had shrimp and Chinese veggies and crab Rangoon. They cut the veggies way too big and the sauce was bland. I won't go back for food but the crab Rangoon was ok. They didn't give any sauce. You have to ask for it. That sucks.
Example_194.explanation: The reviewer clearly did not enjoy the main dishes, citing specific issues with preparation and taste. The only positive aspect mentioned is the convenience of the location and the crab Rangoon being 'ok', which does not outweigh the negative aspects.
key_phrases: I was not a fan of the food
They cut the veggies way too big and the sauce was bland
I won't go back for food

Example_195.review: This is an average Chinese buffet. The food was not bad, but not impressive neither, plus some cheap American food. The food was a little too greasy even by American Chinese food standard, and my stomach complained soon after I left that place. To me, that's a no-go signal.\n\nOn the other hand, they seemed to have a non-buffet counter next-door, perhaps the food would be better there.
Example_195.explanation: The reviewer indicates a negative physical reaction to the food, which is a significant complaint. The greasiness of the food is also criticized, and while the food is not described as bad, it is not praised either. The mention of 'average' suggests mediocrity.
key_phrases: my stomach complained soon after I left that place
The food was a little too greasy even by American Chinese food standard
The food was not bad, but not impressive neither

Example_196.review: I think 2 or 3 stars is accurate for this joint... The chicken is quality meat and its lightly saut\u00e9ed but the sauce is to blah. It's a nice place to sit down and have Chinese food if you have no other local options. \n\nIt's my last resort for Chinese food in the area. Prices are absurd!!!
Example_196.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges the quality of the chicken but is disappointed with the sauce and considers the restaurant a last resort, indicating dissatisfaction. The emphasis on the high prices adds to the negative sentiment.

Example_197.review: That is a great cat they have working, but they only have 3 brands of cat food, all of them expensive. Funny enough though not as expensive as what I was looking for. They followed me around like I was going to stuff my pockets and that just ruined the whole mom and pop thing.
Example_197.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience with the staff's behavior, which made them feel uncomfortable. The limited and expensive selection of cat food also contributed to a less positive review. However, the presence of a cat working there was seen as a positive aspect, but not enough to outweigh the negatives.
key_phrases: followed me around like I was going to stuff my pockets
only have 3 brands of cat food, all of them expensive

Example_198.review: Dr. Eric Segal was a complete ass. He was rude and obnoxious to me and my wife. We went to him for an adjustment and I left wanting to adjust this idiot's face. I will deter all of my clients from going here and will personally make sure that this man doesn't disrespect anyone else like he did to us.
Example_198.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very strong negative sentiment towards Dr. Eric Segal, using harsh language to describe their experience. The desire to prevent others from visiting suggests a very poor experience.
key_phrases: Dr. Eric Segal was a complete ass
wanting to adjust this idiot's face

Example_199.review: I had to get new tires mounted and balanced and when I went to pay, the guy at the register actually says something to the effect of \"Do you have any idea what this is supposed to cost? So, I could charge you $400 and you wouldn't know the difference?\" Joking or not, why even go there?
Example_199.explanation: The reviewer expresses a negative experience with the service, feeling disrespected by the comment made by the guy at the register. The focus is on the poor customer service rather than the food or restaurant itself.
key_phrases: Joking or not, why even go there?
the guy at the register actually says something to the effect of
I had to get new tires mounted and balanced

Example_200.review: Made an appointment for 3:30. They completely forgot I was coming but said they could start on my car in ten minutes and be done in an hour. Came back an hour later only to see my car in the same spot. They said it would take another two hours to start work. Completely unhelpful and unapologetic.
Example_200.explanation: The customer had a negative experience with the service as they had an appointment that was not honored, and the staff was unhelpful and unapologetic about the situation. The customer's expectations were not met, and there was a lack of communication and service.
key_phrases: Came back an hour later only to see my car in the same spot

Example_201.review: Ah Monro, where \"45 minutes\" is actually 2 hours and running at the time of this post. My car is on a lift with no tires and the employees are smoking cigarettes laughing. I can't even escape if I wanted to. At least they turned the heat off in the waiting room. Not like it's November in Pittsburgh or anything...
Example_201.explanation: The customer is expressing significant frustration with the service provided, indicating a much longer wait time than promised and a lack of professionalism from the employees. The sarcastic remark about the heat being off in the waiting room during a cold month adds to the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: My car is on a lift with no tires and the employees are smoking cigarettes laughing
At least they turned the heat off in the waiting room

Example_202.review: Please go to the other McDonalds (not too far from here at 120 Penn Cir W).\n\nOne time while using their drive-thru service, we realized they forgot to add an item on our receipt. We asked how much the real total is and the employee told me, \"like $5.00.\" WHAT!?!!?!! CAN YOU PLEASE USE YOUR REGISTER TO TELL ME HOW MUCH THE ACTUAL TOTAL IS!
Example_202.explanation: The reviewer is expressing frustration with the service, specifically with an error in the order and a lack of proper response when asked for the correct total. The recommendation to go to another location implies a negative experience.
key_phrases: forgot to add an item on our receipt
CAN YOU PLEASE USE YOUR REGISTER TO TELL ME HOW MUCH THE ACTUAL TOTAL IS

Example_203.review: The most important quality a mechanic can have is honesty. Meet Tim Walter. When I take my car to Walter's I know the service will be good, fast and won't take a chunk out of my last paycheck. Calling ahead is usually a good idea so they can fit you in...
Example_203.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the positive attributes of the mechanic, such as honesty, good and fast service, and reasonable pricing. The suggestion to call ahead is practical advice rather than a criticism.
key_phrases: won't take a chunk out of my last paycheck

Example_204.review: Great place. I take my car there for everything. Inexpensive, friendly, and knowledgeable. They've fixed my tire, taped a broken hose temporarily, and done other things for no charge several times. I'd definitely recommend them.
Example_204.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the service, mentioning positive attributes such as the place being great, inexpensive, friendly, and knowledgeable. They also highlight specific instances where they received free services, reinforcing their positive experience.
key_phrases: fixed my tire, taped a broken hose temporarily, and done other things for no charge

Example_205.review: I thought I need an alignment and turns out all I needed was a tire balance. I stopped by he had me go with him and we drove around the block. I didn't cost me a thing because the tire balance was under warranty. Really nice guy.
Example_205.explanation: The customer had a positive experience where their issue was resolved without any cost due to warranty, and they had a favorable impression of the person who helped them.

Example_206.review: Honest. Reliable. Trust Worthy.\n\nTim goes above and beyond with his service. He came to my house 3x one day to check everything he could before I ended up towing it to the garage. I will definitely go back!
Example_206.explanation: The reviewer emphasizes the positive attributes of the service by using strong commendatory phrases. They highlight the exceptional service and express a clear intention to return, which indicates a high level of satisfaction.
key_phrases: goes above and beyond with his service

Example_207.review: Extremely honest, great work and amazing prices. I had them repair a wheel issue on my car. For no charge the mechanic also hid some wires I never got around to moving for the DYI back-up camera I installed.
Example_207.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the honesty, quality of work, and pricing. The additional free service provided by the mechanic further enhances the positive sentiment.

Example_208.review: Plays well with a Tazza latte around the corner! The quiche was divine and the the biscuits were what I imagine my mom would have made had she actually made biscuits. Two words: YUM-OH! Cannot wait to return to the Steel City so I can partake in some of the desserts.
Example_208.explanation: The reviewer uses highly positive language to describe their experience. Words like 'divine' and 'YUM-OH' indicate a very positive sentiment. The anticipation of returning to try more, specifically desserts, also adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: biscuits were what I imagine my mom would have made

Example_210.review: One of the most eclectic venues in Pittsburgh. Shadow Lounge has a great variety of acts that it pulls in.\n\nI just went to their Titletown Soul & Funk Party and it was a really great time. Great music, fun crowd, pretty decent prices on drinks. I'll definitely be going back for Titletown and in general, Shadow Lounge is a great place to see alternative acts in Pittsburgh.
Example_210.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the venue's variety and the quality of the event they attended. They also mention the reasonable drink prices, which adds to their positive experience.
key_phrases: great place to see alternative acts

Example_211.review:
I love this store. I can just spend hours walking around getting ideas of things to either update or change around my house.

All of the sales associates are very helpful and knowledgeable. Sometimes it's hard to find someone to help you because they are busy helping other customers.

They even cut keys that actually work.
Example_211.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by stating their love for the store and spending hours there. The helpfulness and knowledge of the sales associates are praised, and the functional key cutting service is a plus. The only minor negative aspect is the occasional difficulty in finding help, which seems to be due to the associates being busy with other customers, suggesting the store is well-patronized rather than poorly staffed.
key_phrases: sales associates are very helpful and knowledgeable
They even cut keys that actually work

Example_212.review: This was my first time to this Home Depot. Very impressed with the customer service here. We were redoing a bathroom and went in for more tiles. They were out of them. However, a staff member helped us use other tile and decorative pieces to compliment the tile we already had, instead of schlepping all the way to Monroeville to pick up the tile up were originally looking for. We were very happy with the result!
Example_212.explanation: The reviewer expresses a high level of satisfaction with the customer service and the outcome of their visit. Despite the initial inconvenience of the store being out of the specific tiles they wanted, the assistance provided by the staff member led to a positive result.
key_phrases: Very impressed with the customer service
We were very happy with the result

Example_213.review: Most definitely, I'm a fan of this joint. There are fabulous, high-quality displays of glass art, and they offer lots of learning opportunities if you want to make your own glass art or functional glass pieces. Plus, on gallery crawl nights (First Friday of every month!) they have snacks galore.
Example_213.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear enthusiasm and appreciation for the establishment, highlighting the quality of the art displays and the learning opportunities provided. The mention of snacks galore adds to the positive experience.
key_phrases: I'm a fan of this joint
fabulous, high-quality displays of glass art

Example_214.review: Got my hair done in an updo (for only $25!!!!) yesterday for my wedding. they did amazing! they listened to what i wanted and although it took quite a while (i have really long hair) she spent the time to do it right and exactly how i wanted it. great service!!  The price is not high but the quality is!
Example_214.explanation: The reviewer is very satisfied with the service, mentioning that the result was amazing and exactly what they wanted. The positive sentiment is reinforced by the exclamation marks and the appreciation for the good price-quality ratio.

Example_215.review: Provolone sticks arrived undercooked, cheese was fully solid, they tasted okay. The pizza also arrived undercooked, the dough itself was partially uncooked in the middle. I had to put it back into my own oven to finish it off, and then it was greasy and just okay.
Example_215.explanation: The customer had a negative experience with the food being undercooked, which is a significant issue for a restaurant. The fact that the customer had to finish cooking the pizza at home is a strong indicator of dissatisfaction. The use of 'just okay' to describe the taste even after additional cooking suggests a lack of enthusiasm for the food quality.

Example_216.review:
I order from these guys on campusfood.com
They are pretty good .. i get my order on time and their quality has been pretty consistent
I mostly get things like hoagies and pizzas.. they are pretty decent
This place is pretty convenient for me when I am working on campus late at night when most other places have shut down.
Example_216.explanation: The reviewer seems satisfied with the consistency and convenience of the service, especially when other options are not available. The use of 'pretty good' and 'pretty decent' indicates a moderate level of satisfaction without being overly enthusiastic.

Example_217.review: Great Hoagies! \n\nI always get the Steak Deluxe hoagie and my wife gets the Italian Deluxe and then we give each other half of the other ones hoagie because we can never decide on with one to get.
Example_217.explanation: The reviewer expresses enthusiasm about the hoagies, mentioning specific items they enjoy. The difficulty in choosing suggests a positive view of the options available.

Example_218.review: This was one of first pizza places that I've tried inPittsburgh. It was about 5 years ago. I don't have a clear memory of that time but I have Parma pizza phobia ever since... So go figure...
Example_218.explanation: The reviewer has a lasting negative impression ('Parma pizza phobia') despite not remembering the details, which suggests a strong negative experience.
key_phrases: I don't have a clear memory of that time

Example_219.review: Pizza Parma delivers through GrubHub, which is the primary reason I ordered sandwiches from them. BBQ chicken was ok. The bread is a little more on the burnt than toasted side, leading it to be dry. The value is good. The 20\" sandwich was about $11.
Example_219.explanation: The reviewer seems to have a neutral opinion about the BBQ chicken, describing it as 'ok'. The negative aspect is the bread being 'a little more on the burnt than toasted side', which implies a negative experience. However, the sentiment is balanced with a positive note on the value, describing it as 'good'. The fact that delivery is available through GrubHub is mentioned but does not strongly affect the sentiment.
key_phrases: bread is a little more on the burnt than toasted side

Example_220.review: Great friendly service and my order was done fast, which was amazing since I was a walk-in. Lots of toppings piled high but I wish there was more cheese. They did have small bottles of vanilla Coke, which is a rare find these days.
Example_220.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the friendly service and quick preparation of their order, which are significant positives. The abundance of toppings is also seen as a positive aspect. The desire for more cheese is a minor complaint in the context of the overall positive review.

Example_221.review: Everybody, chill out. This is a trendy place to shop, yes, but it also has better prices on some things than Giant Eagle or Trader Joe's (Gasp!). I split my time between Here, Giant Eagle and Trader Joe's pretty evenly, depending on what specialty items I might need.\n\nOh yeah, don't drive here. Walk, ride your bike or take the bus. If you're really smart, you'll avoid the headache and park on one of the many adjacent side streets.
Example_221.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges the trendiness of the place and appreciates the better prices compared to competitors. They also give practical advice about transportation, which suggests a positive sentiment overall. The mention of splitting time between this place and others indicates a balanced view without strong negative or positive bias.
key_phrases: split my time between Here, Giant Eagle and Trader Joe's

Example_222.review: AH! I am never shopping anywhere else for groceries ever again (except if I want like ketchup and bologna and stuff-- then I'll have to go to giant eagle.) But, after coming from the middle of nowhere midwest, I cannot tell you how good it feels to see cheese and meat in the grocery store that I actually want to eat. \n\nAH!
Example_222.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong preference for this grocery store over others, indicating a very positive experience. The mention of 'never shopping anywhere else' suggests high satisfaction, while the exception for certain items is a minor point and does not detract significantly from the overall positive sentiment.
key_phrases: I am never shopping anywhere else for groceries ever again
how good it feels to see cheese and meat in the grocery store that I actually want to eat
except if I want like ketchup and bologna and stuff

Example_223.review:
Whole paycheck is a fitting name.

This Whole Foods is decent for regular items but their prepared food prices have gotten really high as of late. 

I used to shop here for almost everything but their common products can now be had at almost any other grocery store for less.

Whole Foods had it's day as a unique place to shop with hard to find organic produce and products. 

Now it's just more expensive.
Example_223.explanation: The reviewer uses a common nickname 'Whole Paycheck' to imply that the store is very expensive. They note that the prices, especially for prepared foods, have increased, which is a negative point. The reviewer also indicates that the uniqueness of Whole Foods has diminished over time as other stores now offer similar products for less.
key_phrases: prepared food prices have gotten really high
Whole paycheck is a fitting name

Example_224.review: Compared to other Whole Foods locations, this one is tiny! For comparison, the Whole Foods in Las Vegas must be at least three times the size. Still, it's nice to have and it is pretty decent overall albeit pricey.
Example_224.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges the smaller size of the location compared to others, but still finds it decent and appreciates its presence. The mention of it being 'pricey' is a common sentiment about Whole Foods but doesn't seem to heavily impact the overall positive tone.

Example_225.review:
Food poisoning a la Tomato Bisque Soup.

Forever skeptical.

That's too bad, I don't mind paying extra for better produce or better brands. But, I KIND OF mind getting extremely sick, so sick that anything I ever would vouch for goes down the toilet, with my vomit.
Example_225.explanation: The reviewer had a very negative experience, resulting in food poisoning, which is a serious health concern. They also express a loss of trust in the restaurant with 'Forever skeptical'. Despite being willing to pay for quality, their experience was dominated by the negative outcome of getting sick.

Example_226.review: Great selection of vegan, vegetarian, raw milk, prepared foods, bakery, cheeses and aged beef. Very expensive, trader Joe's and Market district come to mind as a cheaper alternative. Parking at this particular store is a nightmare.
Example_226.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the variety of options available, especially for those with dietary restrictions. However, the high prices and parking difficulties negatively impact their experience.
key_phrases: Parking at this particular store is a nightmare

Example_227.review:
everything is a cluster. the store. the parking lot. the people -- customers included. full-on cluster. barely any parking for a massive, heavily polluting pick up truck.

inside: avocados are the price of gold, and there are no goddamn vegan taco spices at a place that's supposed to be so fancy. 

meh. go to market district where they keep it real. real classy!!!
Example_227.explanation: The reviewer uses strong language to express dissatisfaction with multiple aspects of the establishment, including the store setup, parking situation, customer behavior, and product pricing.
key_phrases: avocados are the price of gold

Example_228.review:
I loved it, parking and all, after all, they had Palak Paneer! Mmmmm. It was tasty. I spent a lot, but I was ok with the occasional splurge. the second trip, i again bought my hit foods Palak Paneer and it had obviously gone over. 

Ever have whoopsies after green Indian cuisine?

It's off my list now. Forever.
Example_228.explanation: The review starts positively, with the customer expressing love for the restaurant and a specific dish. However, the sentiment shifts dramatically after a bad experience with the same dish during a second visit, leading to a decision to never return.
key_phrases: It's off my list now. Forever.
Palak Paneer and it had obviously gone over
Ever have whoopsies after green Indian cuisine?

Example_229.review: As a vegan (since 2008) we are a regular at whole foods. It's convenient since we live in Lawrenceville. My one and biggest complaint is that they need to carry more (if not all) organic produce. Not this \"conventional\" garbage. Other than that they have a huge variety of products and grocery items to choose from. Staff is always friendly and helpful.
Example_229.explanation: The reviewer is a regular customer and appreciates the store's convenience and the staff's friendliness. However, they have a significant concern about the lack of organic produce, which they feel strongly about, referring to the conventional options as 'garbage'. The positive aspects seem to outweigh the negative, but the concern about organic produce is a major one for this customer.
key_phrases: need to carry more (if not all) organic produce
huge variety of products and grocery items to choose from

Example_230.review: Hey, Jimmy! Cigarettes are not a replacement for tea bags! The early bird special is cheaper because it is mostly cabbage and the tea tastes like second-hand smoke.\nI had the same dish previously, without the special and it was fine (hence 2 stars and not 1). I'm going to avoid this place until I get a craving to drink tobacco.
Example_230.explanation: The reviewer uses sarcastic language to express dissatisfaction with the quality of the tea and the early bird special. The mention of avoiding the place indicates a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: early bird special is cheaper because it is mostly cabbage
Cigarettes are not a replacement for tea bags

Example_231.review:
Went there last night with 8 peeople. There was another 14 people party.

The food was good -- not great but good. We waited 45 minutes for the first dish to arrive and that only because we sent one of our folk to see what was going on. 

They did bring drinks and tea promptly.
Example_231.explanation: The reviewer had a mixed experience. The positive aspect was that the food was good and drinks came promptly. However, the significant wait time for the food to arrive negatively impacted their experience.
key_phrases: We waited 45 minutes for the first dish to arrive
The food was good -- not great but good
They did bring drinks and tea promptly

Example_232.review: Yep, closed! My dad and I were gonna come here dinner last night. He called me and told me to meet him at China Palace instead. \n\nSo long Jummy Tsang's! You were one of the last of the old time Chinese joints.
Example_232.explanation: The primary sentiment is disappointment due to the restaurant being closed, which prevented the customer's plans. The phrase 'So long Jummy Tsang's!' indicates a farewell and a sense of loss, while 'one of the last of the old time Chinese joints' suggests a nostalgic appreciation for the restaurant.
key_phrases: one of the last of the old time Chinese joints

Example_233.review: The food here is pretty good. Comparable to any 3 to 3.5 star restaurant. The lamb is definitely good. And it is definitely a good date restaurant. I would rather give it 3.5 stars since I've definitely eaten at better restaurants. But for Pittsburgh, it ranks pretty high up.
Example_233.explanation: The reviewer gives a positive assessment of the food quality and specifically praises the lamb. They also recommend it as a good date spot. While they acknowledge having had better experiences elsewhere, they still rate it highly within the context of the local area.
key_phrases: The food here is pretty good

Example_234.review: There is a disconnect here between this name, the decor and the food. That said, I had the best pork chop I've ever had here and for that I was endlessly thankful. Good salad, delicious bread and hummus. Great service. For Pittsburgh, top notch.
Example_234.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive experience with the food quality, specifically highlighting the pork chop as the best they've ever had. Positive remarks about the salad, bread, hummus, and service further support a high sentiment score. The initial disconnect mentioned does not seem to negatively impact the overall positive experience.
key_phrases: the best pork chop I've ever had
Good salad, delicious bread and hummus

Example_235.review: great atmosphere and great food. while the menu changes seasonally, my group all enjoyed the food - crab/scallop pasta, pumpkin risotto and rare tuna.\n\ncasbah also has a great wine list, and great service that is there when you need them, but doesn't annoy.
Example_235.explanation: The reviewer uses the word 'great' multiple times, indicating a high level of satisfaction with the food, atmosphere, and service. The mention of a seasonally changing menu and the specific dishes enjoyed by the group add to the positive sentiment. The positive comment on the wine list further supports the high score.

Example_236.review: This place was recommended by an employee at Evolve spa across the street and I was very happy with the restaurant. The Salmon appetizer was delicious as was the gnocchi meal. I will definitely go back to this restaurant when I visit the area.
Example_236.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the restaurant, mentioning a specific recommendation, enjoying the food, and indicating a desire to return.

Example_237.review:
Overall a good experience. Food was mostly very good. My sweet pea risotto was just OK. My wife's short rib ravioli was creative and very tasty. Neither of us are big eaters, but noted how small the portions were, especially compared to the price. One cup of risotto for $20+? Four ravioli for the same?

They altered the desert recipe on request, which for sure was over and above the call.

Service was attentive and the setting nice.
Example_237.explanation: The review starts with a positive note, praising the food and the experience. The mention of the risotto being 'just OK' is a minor complaint, and the portion size to price ratio is noted as a negative. However, the positive comments about the wife's meal and the accommodating service regarding the dessert recipe outweigh the negatives.
key_phrases: altered the desert recipe on request

Example_239.review: Casbah is definitely my favorite restaurant in P-burgh; in fact, usually when I go somewhere else I wind up regretting that I didn't just go to Casbah. Every dish I've had has been excellent; some favorites are the sheep's milk gnudi, tuna tartare, arugala salad, bread pudding, and pretty much every soup. The short rib ravioli is a must have although arguably a touch salty. The menu is so inventive!
Example_239.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong preference for this restaurant, indicating that they have consistently had excellent dishes and that it is their favorite. They list several favorite dishes and praise the inventiveness of the menu, with only a minor critique about the short rib ravioli being a touch salty.
key_phrases: Every dish I've had has been excellent

Example_240.review:
- Great food. I had the Gerber's Amish Farm Chicken Breast and it was cooked perfectly and delicious =]
- Nice wine selection. Though I'm a beer guy.
- Friendly staff.
- Okay atmosphere.

This place is definitely worth trying. Will be back for seconds!
Example_240.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the food quality, specifically mentioning a dish that was cooked perfectly. They also had a positive experience with the staff and found the wine selection to be nice, although they prefer beer. The atmosphere was only okay, but overall, the review is positive with an intention to return.

Example_241.review: Love Casbah. Been going there for years and have never had a less than great meal and service. OF course their signature lamb is to die for (with the Stag's Leap Petite Syrah). What can I say -- the cheese plate is great. Everything is well-prepared and the service is among the best in the -burgh.
Example_241.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong affection for the restaurant, mentioning they have consistently had great meals and service over the years. They highlight specific dishes like the signature lamb and the cheese plate, and compliment the preparation and service.
key_phrases: never had a less than great meal and service
signature lamb is to die for

Example_242.review: My absolutely favorite dish is the potato gnocchi. Just amazing! Service is fantastic, nice decor. I wish they wouldn't use such huge paper towels in the bathroom, but other than that I really like this place.
Example_242.explanation: The reviewer expresses a very positive opinion about their favorite dish and compliments the service and decor. The comment about the paper towels is a minor complaint and does not significantly detract from the overall positive sentiment.

Example_243.review: Best \"Babaganoush\" we've had since we visited Egypt.\nThe gaspacho soup was fantastic, and since my husband wouldn't share his short rib ravioli, I can only assume they were suburb also. \nThe atmosphere was a tad basic, but it was also different and therefore interesting and enjoyable.
Example_243.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the food, using superlatives like 'best' and 'fantastic', and positive assumptions about the ravioli. The only mild criticism is about the atmosphere being 'basic', which seems to be outweighed by the positive food experience.
key_phrases: short rib ravioli, I can only assume they were suburb also

Example_244.review: It's good when they are on, but they are so inconsistent you never know what you are going to get. The coffee machine looks like it hasn't been cleaned in the last century which is off putting. Generally, I wouldn't recommend it unless you are in the neighborhood and desperately hungry--you MIGHT catch a lucky break and be there on a good day.
Example_244.explanation: The reviewer expresses frustration with the inconsistency of the restaurant's quality, which is a significant issue for customers. The dirty coffee machine is also a negative point that affects the sentiment. The recommendation is conditional and not enthusiastic, suggesting that the experience is generally not positive.
key_phrases: coffee machine looks like it hasn't been cleaned

Example_245.review: Well, I think Heidi S. pretty much covered all of the bases here. The lemon-ginger tea that I ordered was weak, perhaps not steeped hot enough? The hummus, wow, definitely the worst; tasted like paste. Yuck with a capital whY. I considered giving two stars because the service and atmosphere were pleasant, but since I do not plan to return, I guess methinks not.
Example_245.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience with the food, describing it as 'tasted like paste' and 'weak', which are strong indicators of dissatisfaction. The use of 'Yuck with a capital whY' emphasizes their distaste. Although the service and atmosphere were pleasant, the decision not to return indicates a predominantly negative experience.

Example_246.review: Aw it's places like this that make me love Pittsburgh. Its hodge podge decor and hipster crowd are what drew me here in the first place, but turns out the food and coffee is pretty decent even delicious. Since it's far from where I live I don't get to come here half as often as I'd like but I'm always pleased when I do. \n\nSuch cute boys.
Example_246.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the city and the restaurant's ambiance, and they are particularly pleased with the food and coffee, which they find delicious. The distance is a minor inconvenience, but it does not detract from their overall positive experience.
key_phrases: food and coffee is pretty decent even delicious

Example_247.review: The menu looks awesome and the dish concepts are good except everything that comes out is disappointingly bland. Thank god there were bottles of hot sauce and salt on the table. The best part of the meal was the peanut butter chocolate milk shake. The burger and \"spicy\" Cajun soup were very mediocre.
Example_247.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations due to the menu and dish concepts, but the actual food was bland and mediocre. The positive note about the milkshake suggests some redeeming quality, but it's not enough to offset the overall negative experience.
key_phrases: The best part of the meal was the peanut butter chocolate milk shake

Example_248.review: Daniel Fast friendly restaurant with good food. Stopped for an early supper before Saturday night church service after searching Yelp for vegan restaurant options. Food was good, service was good, price was very reasonable. Think I just found a new Saturday evening supper spot.
Example_248.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with both the food and service, and found the prices reasonable. They also appreciated the restaurant's compatibility with their dietary needs.

Example_249.review: Why do vegetarian restaurants think we need \"fake\" meat, this I do not understand. I had a primavera sandwich which was just ok, but the patty on the roll was just as perplexing as the \"mystery meat\" you get in your elementary school cafeteria. My sandwich came with a boring pasta salad and some tortilla chips out of a bag. Otherwise the atmosphere was fun, and the wifi was free if you ask for the password.
Example_249.explanation: The reviewer expresses dissatisfaction with the concept of 'fake' meat and compares the patty unfavorably to 'mystery meat' from a school cafeteria. The pasta salad is described as boring, and the sandwich overall was just ok. Positive notes about the atmosphere and free wifi are mentioned but seem secondary to the food experience.

Example_250.review: My husband and I stopped going here, back in 2010, because of the bad service we were receiving. We used to call the servers \"Whole Foods Rejects\"; they were always cranky and we felt not welcomed, rushed. At the end of 2011, I think they got a new manager, the service has been optimal and we haven't stopped going since. Their food is delicious as well as their drinks and coffee.
Example_250.explanation: The review starts with a negative experience from the past, but the current sentiment is positive, focusing on the improvements in service and quality of food and drinks since the management change.
key_phrases: food is delicious as well as their drinks and coffee
stopped going here, back in 2010, because of the bad service

Example_251.review: Worst tofu scramble ever. Days old, cold, hard, inedible. Sent it back and had no time to wait for another dish. I can't even believe that the server, let alone the \"chef\" thought it appropriate to serve. \n\nBrought my 2 year old along, had to get a high chair, I'm able to do this just would have been nice if asked by server if we needed one.
Example_251.explanation: The reviewer is extremely dissatisfied with the quality of the food, describing it as the worst they've ever had and inedible. They also had a negative experience with the service, as they had to send the food back and were not offered help with a high chair.

Example_252.review: I've found the service here to be pretty terrible. Servers can be pretty careless about taking care of simple things and my friends have had similar experiences. The food is really pretty good, but if the overall service sucks, then well, it makes it hard to enjoy a tasty meal. Sorry Storm, you need to improve this.
Example_252.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges that the food quality is good, which is a positive aspect, but the emphasis on poor service and the use of strong negative language such as 'terrible' and 'sucks' indicates a predominantly negative experience.
key_phrases: service here to be pretty terrible

Example_254.review: Andrew here said it best: \"... food served by workers who mostly don't seem to notice they're working, and when they do, only respond snarkily.\"\n\nIt took me 40 minutes to get a sandwich here, and when I complained I didn't get an apology, just a snarky remark \"well you can see we have a small kitchen\"
Example_254.explanation: The reviewer is expressing frustration with both the service and the attitude of the staff. A long wait time for a simple order and a lack of apology indicate a negative experience.

Example_255.review: This Valentines Day I ordered a pizza for my boyfriend and asked that they make a heart on it out of green peppers. The pizza was great, the heart was perfect, and he loved it!
Example_255.explanation: The review is very positive, mentioning a special request that was fulfilled to satisfaction, a great tasting pizza, and a happy recipient.

Example_256.review: By far my favorite Pizza place in the east end. The buffalo chicken pizza here is fantastic, and very unique. I haven't been able to find anything even remotely approaches it in other cities. \n\nThe place is a bit pricey, but I feel its worth it. My go to pizza delivery place!
Example_256.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong preference for this pizza place, highlighting a particular pizza as fantastic and unique. They also acknowledge the price but feel that the quality justifies it.
key_phrases: buffalo chicken pizza here is fantastic

Example_257.review: DO NOT ORDER THE HOT WINGS!! If you enjoy eating hot sauce flavored gravy paste, then by all means these are the wings for you. If not, stay away. My boyfriend and i each ate one and couldn't even finish the rest of our dinner. Don't waste your money!
Example_257.explanation: The use of all caps in 'DO NOT ORDER THE HOT WINGS!!' indicates a strong negative sentiment. The comparison of the wings to 'hot sauce flavored gravy paste' suggests a very unappetizing experience.
