The fact that they 'couldn't even finish the rest of our dinner' implies that the wings had a significantly negative impact on their overall dining experience. The command 'Don't waste your money!' reinforces the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: DO NOT ORDER THE HOT WINGS!!
couldn't even finish the rest of our dinner

Example_258.review:
The food and customer service from this restaurant are really top notch. I am continually impressed with how fast the delivery is and how likeable the drivers are.

The pizzas here are excellent as long as you don't get the "crab meat" topping (I should have expected gross imitation crab meat since we're so far from the coast).

The breadsticks, jalapeno poppers, and wings are also delicious.

Some of the best pizza in Pennsylvania.
Example_258.explanation: The reviewer expresses high satisfaction with the food and customer service, delivery speed, and the friendliness of the drivers. The mention of excellent pizzas and other delicious items indicates a positive experience. The only negative aspect is the imitation crab meat, but it's presented as a minor issue within an overall positive context.
key_phrases: food and customer service from this restaurant are really top notch
continually impressed with how fast the delivery is

Example_259.review: Lots of great vegan, local, organic, gluten-free, and/or raw food, though some items are quite pricey. Very good rotating-item hot bar for take-out lunch or dinner. Great bulk food selection, including diverse reusable glassware of known tare weight. Fresh fruits and vegetables are right-priced, but processed items like meats, cheeses, and frozen items can be surprisingly expensive. Fairly comprehensive selection, akin to a Whole Foods.
Example_259.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the variety of healthy food options and the quality of the hot bar and bulk selection. The mention of 'right-priced' fresh produce is positive. The concerns about the cost of processed items do not seem to outweigh the positive aspects.
key_phrases: Lots of great vegan, local, organic, gluten-free, and/or raw food

Example_260.review: Just moved here from Baltimore and ran across this place. Love it! Watch yourself at the hot bar. There's no scale (should be). Your mea l(of veggies, tofu and kale) could end up costing $20 easily. I usually grab a hot meal and play on my computer 1-2 hours. Love the carrott juice with ginger YUM! A small is $4.30 ouch! Just found out they won't charge you for bags if you bring your own....COOL!
Example_260.explanation: The reviewer expresses enthusiasm and love for the place and specific items like the carrot juice. The mention of the cost of the meal and juice indicates a slight concern about prices, but it is overshadowed by the positive sentiment. The appreciation for the environmental consideration of not charging for bags if you bring your own adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: Love the carrot juice with ginger YUM!
Just found out they won't charge you for bags if you bring your own....COOL!

Example_261.review: I just found this place a month back and I'm kind of blown away by how awesome it is. Fresh produce, awesome prepared salads and dips, bulk everything, natural cleaners, and plenty of hippie garbage you can't help but fill your shelves with. The best part is that they try to stock up with locally sourced produce, milk, and meat. And you can get a good discount if you purchase stock in the co-op.
Example_261.explanation: The reviewer expresses high enthusiasm and satisfaction with the fresh and diverse offerings, as well as the local sourcing and the financial incentive of a discount.
key_phrases: blown away by how awesome it is
Fresh produce, awesome prepared salads and dips, bulk everything
best part is that they try to stock up with locally sourced produce, milk, and meat

Example_262.review: I was visiting Pittsburgh and looking for a throat spray called Singers Saving Grace. Whole Foods didn't have the item in stock but East End Co-Op did! Also, had a smoothie while a shopped. \n\nWhat a great find!
Example_262.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, finding a specific product they were looking for and enjoying a smoothie during their visit.
key_phrases: had a smoothie while I shopped

Example_264.review: I like this place but the hours are inconvenient (top roping doesn't open until 5PM during the week!!!!) I wish they would expand their hours. Otherwise, they make a nice effort to change their routes relatively often.
Example_264.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear frustration with the limited hours of operation, which is a significant inconvenience. However, they also acknowledge a positive aspect of the place, noting the effort to change routes often.
key_phrases: top roping doesn't open until 5PM during the week
wish they would expand their hours

Example_266.review: Lamb burger was outright bad(tasted off and charred). We shared and together only ate half. The filet was decent but not $25 worth of decent. Waiter was kind and the ambience is romantic but at the end of the day the food just wasn't that good. There are lots of great byo's in the city and in my opinion, this isn't one of them.
Example_266.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with the lamb burger, indicating it was 'outright bad' and that they only ate half of it. They also felt that the filet was not worth the price. Although they mention positive aspects such as the waiter and ambience, the focus on the food quality being subpar drives the sentiment.
key_phrases: filet was decent but not $25 worth of decent

Example_267.review: I've eaten here once after having it suggested by numerous people, I was totally disappointed with the service, food, and the place itself, I will not be headed back......ever\nSave your money, or starve either would be a better option
Example_267.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations due to recommendations but found every aspect of their experience (service, food, and ambiance) to be disappointing. The strong language used ('totally disappointed', 'will not be headed back...ever', 'Save your money, or starve') indicates a very negative sentiment.
key_phrases: totally disappointed with the service, food, and the place itself
Save your money, or starve either would be a better option

Example_268.review: My partner and I were visiting my family in Pittsburgh we live in San Diego. my partner was born and raised in Portugal. My mom heard about this resaurant and was excited to take my partner and I to a Portuguese restaurant in Pittsburgh. We went, looked at the menu and did not find anything Portuguese on the menu. Why does this restaurant promote itself as Portuguese, fly the Portuguese flag and not have ANY Portuguese dishes. We left.
Example_268.explanation: The reviewer had specific expectations for Portuguese cuisine, which were not met. The disappointment is evident in the fact that they left the restaurant due to the lack of authenticity in the menu.
key_phrases: did not find anything Portuguese on the menu
Why does this restaurant promote itself as Portuguese

Example_269.review: The grounds are very nice here, but I have to say the part I loved best was the collection of cars. I've never seen so many antique vehicles in one place. Definitely makes it worth checking out. However. The location is a bit wacky. It's right outside of Wilkinsburg, which isn't a place to visit at all. But still, it is nice enough to check out. Especially if you want to just go have a nice lunch at the cafe.
Example_269.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear positive sentiment about the collection of cars and the grounds, indicating these are highlights. The mention of the location being 'wacky' and near an undesirable area is a minor negative point, but it does not seem to detract significantly from the overall positive experience.
key_phrases: loved best was the collection of cars

Example_270.review: A delightful (and free?) way to spend the afternoon. The grounds are beautiful, and the architecture is great, and the nearby Frick Park is a wonderful walk. It is quite a gem in the middle of this city. Didn't tour the Clayton (reservation needed), so can't comment on that building.
Example_270.explanation: The reviewer uses positive language such as 'delightful,' 'beautiful,' and 'wonderful walk' to describe their experience. The phrase 'quite a gem' suggests a high level of appreciation for the location.

Example_271.review:
Damn good ice cream. 

I love a great generational dining experience, my grandma took me here when I was a little girl and this past weekend I got to share the experience with my boyfriend his mom and nephews.

I ordered a traditional banana split, but really I wanted to have one of everything on the menu. 

The strawberries are real strawberries!!! That alone sets Page Dairy Mart a part from the rest.
Example_271.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong positive feelings about the ice cream and the quality of the ingredients. The desire to order one of everything indicates a high level of satisfaction with the menu. The mention of a generational dining experience adds a personal and positive touch to the review.
key_phrases: wanted to have one of everything on the menu

Example_272.review:
The best soft serve I have ever had. Some flavors are better than others. Of the mint chocolate chip, toasted coconut, and pistachio that I tried last night (what can I say, I was hungry) the toasted coconut was the best. It has real pieces of toasted coconut.

A very good value for your money.

Don't expect to find any seating here.
Example_272.explanation: The reviewer expresses high praise for the soft serve, indicating a very positive experience. They also note the good value for money and the quality of specific flavors, like the toasted coconut with real pieces. The comment about some flavors being better than others suggests a slight nuance to their overall positive experience.
key_phrases: The best soft serve I have ever had
A very good value for your money

Example_273.review: The food is unforgettable, but unfortunately so is the bill. Sicilian themed with fresh ingredients in an intimate setting all prepared in an open kitchen.\n\nAsk before you order a special, or you might be stunned when you are handed the check. But if you love food and money is no object, this is your place. A great place for Valentine's day or a special anniversary splurge, with the emphasis on the word 'splurge'.
Example_273.explanation: The reviewer has a positive view of the food quality and the atmosphere of the restaurant, but they also emphasize the high cost of dining there. The use of 'unforgettable' is a strong positive, but the mention of the bill indicates a significant negative aspect. The recommendation for those who do not worry about the cost suggests that the experience is overall positive for the right audience.
key_phrases: if you love food and money is no object

Example_274.review: Seated in the bar after having made reservations a week in advance. That, paired with a mediocre menu and overall experience, gives this two stars. Save your money and stay in town. I would probably send you to the (gasp) Olive Garden before I referred you here.
Example_274.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience, noting both the seating arrangement despite reservations and the quality of the menu. The comparison to Olive Garden, with 'gasp', implies a strong negative sentiment.
key_phrases: Seated in the bar after having made reservations a week in advance
Save your money and stay in town

Example_275.review: Had chicken salad. Was good but very pricey. Their pizza is about 20-30% more expensive than any comparable pizza in the area. And since the pizza is just mediocre it is definitely not a good value so I'll pass!
Example_275.explanation: The reviewer had a mixed experience. They thought the chicken salad was good, but they also felt that the pizza was mediocre and overpriced compared to other places. The emphasis on price and value suggests a negative sentiment towards the cost-benefit ratio of the food.

Example_276.review: Open 24hrs on Friday and Saturday how can you not love it. Total old school mom and pop diner. Wouldn't recommend anything other than breakfast. On top of everything else it cost nickels and dimes to eat here. After you've blown all your money at a bar in southside you'll still have enough to eat away some of your drunkness on the way home.
Example_276.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment towards the restaurant's hours and its old school, mom and pop diner feel. The mention of low cost is also positive. However, there is a slight negative sentiment in not recommending anything other than breakfast, but this seems to be overshadowed by the overall positive tone.
key_phrases: how can you not love it
Total old school mom and pop diner
cost nickels and dimes to eat here

Example_277.review: I usually love this place but it's gone bad. Went to one in wv the other day and it was good. I think different owners. My beef this one is the cheese. Very pour quality. Bread and sauce still good though.
Example_277.explanation: The reviewer expresses disappointment with the decline in quality, specifically mentioning the cheese. However, they also note that the bread and sauce are still good, indicating some remaining positive aspects.
key_phrases: Bread and sauce still good though

Example_278.review: It has rebounded from when it closed in 08 and now does some veg stuff along with the bar food. I'd still much rather eat up the street at Max's though.\n\nThat said the clientele is nice/colorful & im glad it's reopened.
Example_278.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges positive changes and variety in the menu, as well as a pleasant clientele. However, the preference for another restaurant suggests that the experience was not outstanding.
key_phrases: rebounded from when it closed in 08
does some veg stuff along with the bar food

Example_279.review: I love this place. They'll all know your name after the second or third visit and people tend to be very welcoming and open without being too \"Cheers-y\"\n\nFood is above average for a bar, especially the Middle Eastern selections.
Example_279.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by stating they love the place. The mention of food being above average for a bar indicates satisfaction with the quality of the food. The additional comments about the staff being welcoming and remembering the customer's name suggest a personal and positive experience.
key_phrases: Food is above average for a bar

Example_280.review: This is one of my favorite bars in Pittsburgh. They have been getting a lot of bands to play. Especially font of the Wednesday night Blue Grass jam night. The hummus is great. The staff is exceptionally friendly and knows my name. They have a great beer selection too.
Example_280.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong preference for this bar, mentioning it as a favorite and highlighting several positive aspects such as live music, food quality, staff friendliness, and beer variety.

Example_281.review: Went my first time for Thursday karaoke and had a blast! They serve mediterranean fare; at least half the menu is vegetarian/easily vegan. There are at least 2 bike racks outside, cars have decent options too. At 10pm an improv comedy group showed... you can imagine the energy. Super fun night, met some cool people, ate healthy food. Oh yes, and it's no smoking!  \n\nDownside? It's a little pricey, but the quality is there, so... you decide.
Example_281.explanation: The reviewer had a very positive experience, mentioning multiple times that they enjoyed themselves ('had a blast', 'Super fun night') and appreciated the healthy food options. The mention of the price being 'a little pricey' is the only negative aspect, but it is immediately countered with recognition of the quality.

Example_282.review: Really great place to go. There was bluegrass music playing when I went which was a pleasant surprise. It wasn't too loud, so you could talk with others at your table. The food and service was great. Definitely want to come back here again
Example_282.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience with both the food and service, enjoyed the ambiance provided by the bluegrass music, and expresses a desire to return, indicating a high level of satisfaction.
key_phrases: Definitely want to come back here again

Example_283.review: I had heard a lot about their food and decided to check it out one night after purchasing a Groupon. This review is strictly for the food. It was not good. The hummus was okay, and our main plate seemed to be microwaved. \n\nThe bar ambiance seemed cool though. So if you are looking for a bar atmosphere, I'd probably rate this 3.5 stars. For dinner, not that great.
Example_283.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations due to what they had heard, but the food did not meet those expectations. The main dish seemed microwaved, which is generally a negative point for restaurant food quality. However, they found the hummus to be okay and the bar ambiance to be cool, which slightly mitigates the overall negative sentiment.
key_phrases: our main plate seemed to be microwaved

Example_284.review: Up-charges most of their products that you can find on B&H for way less money. Sales person treated me like I was a very inexperienced. Not a bad place if you're in need of camera gear without a moments notice, but overall definitely order offline.
Example_284.explanation: The reviewer is dissatisfied with the pricing and the treatment they received from the salesperson, suggesting a negative experience. However, they acknowledge the convenience of the place for urgent needs, which adds a slightly positive aspect.
key_phrases: Sales person treated me like I was very inexperienced
Not a bad place if you're in need of camera gear without a moments notice

Example_285.review: Visiting from San Francisco. Food was mediocre at best. Bland is the best description. Sausages and Weiner Schmitzel were unremarkable. Best was the sweet & sour cabbage that accompanied. But also served were over-boiled 'daily vegetable' of snap peas, asparagus, and red peppers.... to the point that they were losing their color. Good beer. Yes it has old photos of days gone by... but really there seemed no joy here now...
Example_285.explanation: The reviewer uses words like 'mediocre', 'bland', and 'unremarkable' to describe the food, which are all negative descriptors. The mention of over-boiled vegetables adds to the negative experience. The positive note about the beer does not outweigh the overall negative dining experience.
key_phrases: Sausages and Weiner Schmitzel were unremarkable

Example_286.review: Great atmosphere of a neighborhood pub, good German beer selection, but food was less than mediocre. Won't be back. Weisswurst was very bland. Sauerbraten was dry and tasteless. Spaetzle was, well, not tradidional German Spaetzle. Schnitzel and purple cabbage were the high points, but then again, it's hard to screw up a fried veal cutlet.
Example_286.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the atmosphere and beer selection but is highly critical of the food, which is a central aspect of a restaurant's offering. The use of 'less than mediocre' and the decision not to return indicate strong dissatisfaction. The specific criticisms of the main dishes further support a negative sentiment.

Example_287.review: I really like this Northside institution. They serve the beer in jars and I had Spaten German beer- very good. They put really buttery free popcorn on the table so be careful- the grease sticks to your fingers. In the bar they have an old fashioned player piano. I really like the German fare- big portions. The schitzel is good but not great but overall way better than Hofbrauhaus and not Disney- it's the real McCoy.
Example_287.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear liking for the establishment, mentioning 'I really like' twice. They enjoyed the beer and the ambiance, including the player piano. The comparison to Hofbrauhaus suggests a positive sentiment, and 'the real McCoy' implies authenticity and quality. The only mild criticism is that the schnitzel is 'good but not great,' which does not significantly detract from the overall positive review.

Example_288.review: I have been going to Max's for 20 years. I love this place. The Einlauf soup is just simple good eats, but if you're ever there when the soup special is beer cheese - ORDER IT!!. I love their potato pancakes, sauerbraten and the basket of German rolls served with sauerkraut salad and apple butter. The waitresses have been there for years, they are the best! Most delicious long island iced tea in the city.
Example_288.explanation: The reviewer expresses a long-term relationship with the restaurant and a strong affection for it. They have specific favorite dishes and praise both the food and the service.
key_phrases: Most delicious long island iced tea in the city
The waitresses have been there for years, they are the best!

Example_289.review: Excellent German food. I went in for an early lunch, the service was great. Had a whole feast of great dishes. The best sauerkraut i've ever had -- subtle, with caraway. Sweet and sour cabbage, potato salad, spaetzle, a great weisswurst, and a great wheat beer on tap.
Example_289.explanation: The reviewer uses superlatives such as 'excellent' and 'the best' to describe the food and service, indicating a very positive experience. The mention of a 'whole feast of great dishes' and specific items that were enjoyed adds to the positive sentiment.
key_phrases: The best sauerkraut i've ever had

Example_290.review:
What to eat for dinner? Hmmm, a nearby German restaurant sounds good (and it was). There's nothing extraordinary to get into detail about so:

1 star for free street parking
1 star for ample seating/tables
1 star for friendly service
1 star for a very good meal

Simple, yet effective. Danke.
Example_290.explanation: The reviewer had a positive experience, mentioning specific aspects they appreciated such as the meal quality, service, parking, and seating. They did not find anything extraordinary, but overall had a good experience.

Example_291.review: The food isn't as good as it once was. The atmosphere is kind of dark and needs to be updated. We ordered potato pancakes that had to be returned because they somehow tasted fishy (I don't even want to speculate). The other items we ordered were ok. Staff is great, very friendly and attentive.
Example_291.explanation: The reviewer indicates a decline in food quality and an unappealing atmosphere, which are significant negatives. However, they also mention that the staff was friendly and attentive, and that other items were acceptable, which adds some positivity to the review.
key_phrases: food isn't as good as it once was
atmosphere is kind of dark and needs to be updated
potato pancakes that had to be returned

Example_292.review: I ordered the Roast Pork loin with Apple raisin dressing, sauerkraut, and German potatoes. Oh yeah... Right Choice! Took a little longer than usual as there was a Large Party of 16 that ordered Just prior to us. Happy to say the waitress took Great care of us, plenty of rolls, drink refills, etc. as we waited. Apple Strudel for the Final Act. So Good, I forgot to take a picture. lol
Example_292.explanation: The reviewer is very satisfied with their meal choice, indicating it was the 'Right Choice!' They also had a positive experience with the service, noting that the waitress took 'Great care of us.' The positive experience is further emphasized by the dessert, which was 'So Good' that the reviewer forgot to take a picture. The slight delay due to a large party is mentioned but does not seem to detract from the overall positive experience.
key_phrases: So Good, I forgot to take a picture

Example_293.review: I really like this place. It has a neat atmosphere where the entrance has a nice bar and then there are a few other rooms that have the feeling of a living room or dining room. I really enjoy their brunches, but their pretzels are amazing. The one thing I don't like, which is a bit disappointing, is their potato pancakes. They are a little lumpy and not quite fried enough. With that said, it is definitely worth the visit.
Example_293.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear liking for the place, mentioning a neat atmosphere and particularly enjoying the brunches and pretzels. The criticism of the potato pancakes is presented as a minor issue in the context of an overall positive experience.

Example_294.review:
Tremendous selection of German dishes. All the sausages come from a particular manufacturer in Wisconsin that uses 100 year old methods of making them (according to the menu). I don't know if that's a good thing or not, but they taste terrific. 

The options for sides are as plentiful as the moan dishes and the hot bacon potato salad was awesome. 

Definitely recommend giving this a try.
Example_294.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear satisfaction with the taste of the food and the selection available. The use of 'terrific' and 'awesome' to describe the food, along with a recommendation, indicates a very positive experience.
key_phrases: hot bacon potato salad was awesome

Example_295.review: Max's is great. It feels like your German grandmothers house and the service matches this feeling. The food is authentic and inexpensive. If you are not too familiar with German food, just ask and the waitress will walk you though the favorites.\n\nI love the sausages and the stuffed pretzels are amazing, but the Apple Fritter is the greatest thing ever.
Example_295.explanation: The reviewer uses highly positive language, indicating a strong appreciation for the restaurant's atmosphere, service, and food. Phrases like 'the greatest thing ever' and 'amazing' show a high level of satisfaction.

Example_296.review: This used to be the best German food in town. I have seen a gradual decline in the food over the past several years. The gravies have changed and the Max's Goulash (one of my favorite dishes) has a different sauce (strangely dessert sweet) and change in the protein. The sides are still great, but the food used to be so much better.
Example_296.explanation: The reviewer expresses disappointment with the changes in the food quality over time, particularly with the gravies and the sauce for a favorite dish. The positive note about the sides is overshadowed by the nostalgia for the better quality of the past.

Example_298.review: I love this place. The atmosphere, the bartenders, the waitresses and most of all the food. The potato pancakes are delicious as are all their soups. I think there is something for everyone here. Their desserts are all delicious. We eat here before most concert or sporting event.
Example_298.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment by using the phrase 'I love this place' and compliments multiple aspects of the restaurant, including the food, atmosphere, and service.

Example_299.review: Was at a beautiful wedding. Staff was terrible, unpleasant, and the two slobs at the front desk need to be in the back with their people skills. Nice hotel but make sure you take some warm bodies with you because the \"people\" at the priory are cold, miserable and just plain miserable. I get better guest service at Holiday Inn
Example_299.explanation: The review starts with a positive note about the wedding but quickly turns negative with harsh criticism of the staff and their people skills. The comparison to a lower-tier hotel chain suggests a significant expectation gap in service quality.
key_phrases: two slobs at the front desk
cold, miserable and just plain miserable

Example_300.review: Good neighborhood bar/restaurant. Always good food. Never got sick, or anyone I was with get sick. Have been there with another person upto party's of 10. Always friendly staff. Usually goto Billy's once a month, maybe more. Living right on top of the hill from Billy's, we are regulars there!
Example_300.explanation: The reviewer consistently has a positive experience with the food and staff. The mention of never getting sick implies a trust in the food's quality, and being a regular visitor indicates overall satisfaction.
